author: @이지아-d3t
text: 저는 지금 20살 인데, 저는 고등학생이 될 때까지, 그리고 고등학생이 되고나서도 많은 정말 상처투성이였고 괴롭게하는 나날들이 많았어요 저에게 쌍둥이 동생이 있는데,  선천적으로 장애를 가지고 태어나서 사랑도 동생에게 빼앗겼었고 항상 어른들은 동생이 아프니까, 너가 누나니까 참아야한다는 말을 많이 들었어요 그리고 7살 때부터 제가 안좋은 습관이라고도 할 수 있는데 울고싶어도 저는 울려고 하지 않았어요 제가 울어도 달라지는건없고, 울어도 봐주는 사람이 없다고 생각해서 안괜찮아도, 울고싶어도 웃으려고 했어요 그래야 괜찮아 질 것 같아서, 웃어야 한다 생각했어요 그래야 괜찮아질 것 같아서, 그리고 자기최면으로 지아야, 익숙하잖아, 울면 너만 이상해져 라고 자기최면을 했어요 그리고 초등학교 때 부터 고등학교 때까지 심하게 왕따를 당하게 되고 항상 저를 남자화장실에 가두고 누군가의 잘못을 뒤집어쓰고 사물함을 열면 쓰레기가 나오고 뭐만하면 항상 저만 욕먹으면서 고등학생이되었는데 이 습관이 아예 익숙해져서 저는 울려고 하지 않고 웃고, 상처받아도 티내지 않고 자기최면으로 '익숙하잖아, 한 두번도 아니잖아, 괜찮아, 웃자, 울어도 아무도 안봐줘, 울면 너만 이상한 사람될껄?'이렇게 자기최면했고 힘들어도 주변에 힘들다고 말하지 않고 괜찮아, 힘내자 울어도된다고 생각하는것이 이상하다고 생각할 정도로 몸에 그냥 아예 모습이 베였었어요 그리고 2019년도 정말 단 하루도 쉬지 못했어요 제가 모든 것을 짊어져야 하게 됬을 때 , 즉 리더의 자리로 서게 됬을 때가 있었어요 내가힘들어하면 동생들도 힘들거고 동생들도 아프고 함들텐데 내가 여기서 이러면 안돼라는 생각과 함께 내 밑에 있는 동생들을 위해 웃고 혼자서 짊어지고 가는 부분이 많았어요 그리고 밤낮으로 계속되는 스케줄과, 연습, 모임이 많았어 가지구 뛰어다니구 바쁘게 살다보니 2020년 1월 1일 결국 쓰러졌어요 스트레스를 너무 많이 받게 되다보니 과로가 오게 되면서 쓰러지고 응급실에 가서 치료를 받고 어느덧 정신을 차려보니 지금이 되어있더라구요 그리고 응급실에서 쉬면서 내가 쉬질 못했구나 라는 생각도 들었고 응급실에서 세븐틴 오빠들의 노래를 듣고있었는게 웃음꽃을 들으면서 위로도 많이 얻게 되었고 그 이후, 시간이 지난 후에 우리, 다시라는 곡을 들으면서 내가 괜찮아지고 싶어서, 참기 위해 억지로 웃는 것이 아닌, 진짜 내가 웃고 싶어서, 내가 웃음을 원해서, 즐거워서 웃을 수 있게 되었어요 정말 오빠들 덕분에 제가 웃을 수 있게 되었어요 웃고 싶어서 웃게 되었고 우리, 다시를 듣는데 너무 눈물이 났어요 정말 많이 울었어요 지칠 때가 많았어요, 울고싶을 때가 참 많았는데 그걸 참다보니 저는 저를 잃어가고 나이에는 맞지 않게 행동하다가 누군가 저에게 '정말 많이 힘들었겠다, 참는데 얼마나 힘들었을까?,부모님보다 너가 제일 많이 걱정됬어, 왜냐하면 너는 동생을 보면서도 마음이 아팠을텐데 그 외에도 왕따, 그리고 사랑받지 못한 것에 대해서, 그리고 그 외에 많은 아픔과 상처가 많았을텐데, 참지 않아도 돼, 나이에 맞게 행동해도 돼, 너무 참을 필요없어, 그냥 크게 울어도 돼' 라고 말해주더라구요 그리고 오빠들을 보면서도 많이 느꼈어요 쉬어가도된다는 것을 잠시 쉬고 솔직해져도 된다는 것을 참 많이 느꼈어요 오빠들 정말 고마워요 이런 것들을 알려줘서, 웃을 수 있게 해줘서, 위로해줘서 정말 고마워요 진짜 웃음을 기억하개 해줘서 정말 고마워요 울어도되구나.. 울어도 괜찮구나... 울어도 나를 안아주는 사람이 있을거야 라는 생각이 들 수 있도록 이렇게 예쁜가사를, 곡을 선물해줘서 너무너무 고마워요 정말.. 고마워요

text: 오빠들이 이글을 볼수도 있고 안 볼수도 있겠지만 저는 오빠들이 없었다면 지금의 저는 없었을거에요 슬플때는 오빠들을 찾고 기쁠때도 오빠들을 찾았어요 아직 얼마 되지 않은 캐럿이지만 오빠들이 저의 조그만한 희망을 더 많이 훨씬더 크게 키워줬던거 같아요 이 노래를 들으면 항상 눈물을 흘려요 제가 오빠들을 보면서 지금까지 살면서 가장 많이웃고 울었던거 같아요 오빠들을 보면 '어떻게 저렇게 힘들어도 힘든내색을 안내고 저렇게 열심히 할수있는걸까'라고 생각했어요 이 히트 더로드 보면서 오빠들이 '무대뒤에서 이렇게 힘들었고 그동안 마음고생이 많았구나'라는 생각을 많이 했어요 이렇게 힘든데도 우리보고 다시 올라오고 그 모습이 너무 슬퍼서 히트더로드 보면서 계속 울었던거 같아요 이렇게 힘든줄도 모르고 계속해서 많은걸 바라니까 너무 미안하고 속상했어요 앞으로 남은 기간은 별로없지만 우리는다시 항상 흩어지지 않은 세븐틴 캐럿이니까 절대 떨어질일 없고 헤어질일 없으니까 우리는 항상 언제든 웃으면서 울면서 만나요 웃는 모습도 좋고 우는모습도 좋으니까 우리캐럿들한테는 솔직했으면 좋겠어요 항상 어디서든 우리는 기다릴수 있어요 언제나 그랬듯이 웃음꽃 피우면서 울음꽃 피우면서 만나요 언제가 만날 그날까지  오빠들 힘내고 아프면 그때그때 쉬고 회복하고 다시 행복하게 웃으면서 울면서 만나요

author: @LikeSIEUN
text: 언제 들어도 좋은 눈물나는 곡...보고싶은 내 가수 나의 세븐틴들아 우리가 비록 지금은 서로 얼굴을 보진 못하겠지만 함께 같은 노래를 듣고 같은 하늘을 바라보고 서로의 생각을 하고 서로를 보고싶어하며 살아간다면 그게 함께 있다는것 아닐까 물론 진짜 같이 있는건 아니지만 같이있다는 느낌...?! 컴백 준비로 바쁘고 또 이 상황이 조금은 원망 스러울 수도 있겠지만 우리 같이 버텨내자! 우리 다시 함께 노래할 그날을 기다리며, 꿈꾸며 2020.10.02 세봉이들이 너무 보고싶은 인천사는 18살 캐럿이

author: @생이-r1v
text: 아직도 생생해 ... 독서실에서 시험공부 중에 이 영상 올라온 날 에어팟 꼽고 듣다가 혼자 1인실에서 울어버린 그 기억 ...... 잊을 수 없어 들을 때마다 눈물 주르륵이야 진짜 이제 2년 남았나 ㅎ 진짜 되게 많이 좋아했어 세븐틴 다른 아이돌이 눈에 들어오다가 세븐틴 노래나 영상 하나만 보면 역시 난 세븐틴이구나 난 아직 세븐틴을 너무 좋아하구나 역시 난 그냥 아직 세븐틴이구나 라는 걸 느껴서 놀라운데 세븐틴이 2년 뒤에 해체한다는 생각ㄱ이 들때 난 진짜 그 때 어떤 표정으로 어떻게 반응할지 감히 상상도 안가 .... 진짜 세븐틴이 이거 하나만 알아줬음 좋겠다 정말 몇년동안 세븐틴이란 이름으로 활동이 끝날 때까지 끈임없이 아낌없이 후회없이 세븐틴을 좋아했으니까 너무 울지 않을게 활동이 끝나고 영원히 기억할게 내 몇년동안의 사랑이 헛되지 않게 죽을 때까지 기억할게 우리 캐럿들 잊지말고 세븐틴으로 활동할 때 못지않게 아직도 캐럿들이 기다리고 그리워하고 사랑한다는거 꼭 기억해줬으면 좋겠다 사랑했고 사랑하고 계속 사랑할게 사랑해 세븐틴 ♥️ 영원하자 ♥️

author: @som4282
text:
계속 들을때마다 눈물이 난다 ㅠㅠ
세븐틴 항상 캐럿들에게 힘이되는 곡 선물해줘서 고마워.
빛나는 돌맹이, 캐럿과 세븐틴.
천천히 오래오래 '같이가요'.
난 이런 13명의 팬인것이 가장 기쁘더라.
항상 끈끈한 우정, 팀워크를 보여주는 세븐틴이 참 좋더라.
이번 10월 컴백도 건강하게 활동하자.
지금은 아직 세븐틴을 직접 보지는 못하지만,
곧 응원법 들으면서 무대할수 있는날이 올거야.
응원할께.
세븐틴 영원히 빛내줄께, 아껴줄께.
아낀다,예쁘다,고맙다. 
FOREVER. SEVENTEEN.

author: @joan7135
text: I'm here on a daily basis and it never fails to me make feel depressed its like reality hits, it makes me realise that time really does pass by so quickly that one day these boys will grow up and things will start to change, I am not saying they will part ways, but it will just be a different feeling, like our 2nd gens, 2pm, suju, shinee, they are all still tgt but it feels different.  But this is reality, like a part of me is sad but the other part of me is happy for being able to grow with them, and I guess this is what celebrities actually do, make their fans appreciate and support them no matter what stage of life both of us are in. Like I am genuinely sad thinking about how time really flies. Seeing them mature makes me realise even more that we really do age so quickly and should just do whatever we want and not regret anything done. I really do see seventeen being together for a long time, I really hope so.

author: @sanoYun-m5f
text: 노래 가사, 멜로디가 조곤 조곤 나한테 힘내라고 한마디 건내는거 같아서 들을 때마다 감정이 울컥울컥 올라온다. 세븐틴의 팬이지만 댓글을 남겨본적도 없고, 그냥 멀리서 지켜보기만했는데 이노래를 최근에 줄곧 들어오면서 한마디 남기고 싶었다. 처음에 좋아하게된 계기는 우연히 알게되어서 좋아하기 시작했지만, 세븐틴을 알아갈수록 나에겐 단순히 아이돌이 아닌 위로, 하루를 시작하게 해주는 버팀목이 된거같다. 13명이나 되는 사람들이 각자의 뜻을 한때 모아서 이런 작품을 만들고 보여준다는게 그모습이 어쩌면 나에게있어서 정말 감사하고 좋은 인연인거 같다, 이인연을 계속 이어 나갔으면 좋겠다. 그러니 아프지말고, 나에게 보여준 만큼 행복한 일만 가득했으면 좋겠다. 오늘도 고마워 세븐틴!

text:
네가 편히 걸을 수 있도록
언젠가 널 위핸 길을 만들어 줄 거야
파도위에서 흔들리고 있어도

낯선 길 위에서

너를 향한 이길은 끝나지 않을 거야
모든 이유와 이 길이

네가 더는 지치지 않게 내가
내가 널 지켜 줄게

다시 꼭 만나자
어두운 밤을 걸을 때
걱정하지 마 내가 있잖아
밝은 빛이 스며들어 어둠을 밝혀줘

이 길의 끝에서 반환점 마저 지나면
네가 더는 지치지 않게 내가
내가 널 지켜 줄게
혹여 무슨 일 있어도 우리
다시 만날 거야

잠시 우리 숨을 고르고 또다시
힘들고 지친 여정을
끝내고 우리 마주해
아침이 오기 전에 그때

author: @Dinoremi
text:
This song hits straight into the heart. It has never failed to make me emotional. I can't help but come back to it. I have been a carat for a year now and it is the best decision I made in my life and will forever be the best decision of mine. The only regret I have is that why didn't I know them from the start. But although I was not there in the beginning, I promise to be there till the last "Say The Name" and even after than that. Sharing this fandom with such great people and having such great idols is the best thing that happened to me. I think this one of my life as a Carat has been the happiest one I have ever had. Seventeen changed me but for the better, they made me a person who I never was. They taught me to love myself and do everything with passion. I don't know what would have happened to me if I never got to know about them. I promise to love you, Seventeen till the end and even after that. I promise to support you in every decision you make. You would never know how grateful I am to have you in my life. I'll forever be grateful.
I love you Seventeen.

author: @YEON130
text:
[ 우리 , 다시 ]

네가 편히 걸을 수 있도록
언젠가 널 위한 길을 만들어 줄거야
파도 위에서 흔들리고 있어도
훗날 우리 파도를 밟고 서 있을 거야
낯선 길 위에서
누구나 길을 잃어버릴 수 있어
험난한 길도 내가 함께할 테니

우리 다시 함께 노래하는 그때 그날까지
너를 향한 이 길은 끝나지 않을 거야
모든 이유와 이 길이
아름다운 건 네가 있어서
이 길의 끝에서 반환점까지 지나면
네가 더는 지치지 않게 내가
내가 널 지켜줄게
혹여 무슨 일 있어도 우리
다시 꼭 만나자

어두운 밤을 걸을 때
걱정하지 마 내가 있잖아
밝은 빛이 스며들어 어둠을 밝혀줘
우리 다시 함께 노래하는 그때 그날까지
너를 향한 이 길은 끝나지 않을 거야
모든 이유와 이 길이
아름다운 건 네가 있어서
이 길의 끝에서 반환점 마저 지나면
네가 더는 지치지 않게 내가
내가 널 지켜줄게
혹여 무슨 일 있어도 우리
다시 만날 거야

잠시 우리 숨을 고르고 또 다시
힘들고 지친 여정을
끝내고 우리 마주해
아침이 오기 전에 그때
절정이 이르듯 우린
성장통을 겪고 있는 거야
나에게로 와 길을 헤메고 있다면 언제든
따스한 온기를 나누면 길을 다시금
찾을 수 있을 테니까
겁내지 않아도 괜찮아
이 길의 끝에 온기와 따뜻한 미소가
빠르게 지나가는 시간 속에 우릴 지켜줄거야

잠시 속도를 늦춰도 우리
다시 만날거야

author: @nissaayu6818
text: August 2020, im in my post caratland depression. I miss them so bad, i want to see them in person, i miss being with fellow carats screaming their name, feel the same feeling at the same time. Watching them shining bright on stage. Listening them singing all the comfort songs we need to hear. I miss them so much that hurts. This song really emphasized our relationship. I want to see Us, Again live after this situation get better. Hearing them sing this song for us in person. Until then i have to be content with watching this video. Until then both them and also me need to be healthy . Until we can see each other again. Looking at their face one by one. Giving them the loudest scream, showing them how much i miss them

author: @Pfomtnanatsuji
text: The way I saw it, I was thinking how Smile flower was a song for carats, from seventeen - gifting us by telling us that our smiles were precious to them, but this song; us, again is a story about SVT's journey from the past to now, and for the future. No one knows the future and we all know nothing lasts forever, but by saying that we will meet again, is SVT's gift of hope for the unseen future and a message that they will never have left us because they have left us music and songs.

author: @Mstrickster2
text:
Just found out from the comments section that they wrote the lyrics for their part in their own handwriting; that makes this feel all the more special to me. Thank you SEVENTEEN, for being there for us, for being there for me.
I was scared walking through the night alone; your song was there to protect me. I was pushed to the edge; your song was there to remind me I can still find happiness, at least in you. Thank you. I will try harder to be okay so we can meet again.

text:
This song really makes me tear up every single time (just like Smile Flower), not because it's sad, but because it makes me feel super thankful. I've been a fan of various groups (yep, I'm old ><), but getting to know, and becoming a fan of, Seventeen more than 5 years ago is one of the biggest blessings in my life. Seventeen brought my old self back to life. Seventeen is also the only group that made me feel loved and trusted as a fan. They really do connect with Carats.

Carats let's support and love Seventeen, even after the last Say the Name. <3

08-25-2020

I just feel like listening to it rn, i dont know but im feeling emotional to this song. I wish good health to all my boys❤

Dont stop creating good music. You didnt know but you helped me to love myself, to be confident, to overcome my depression. I thank seventeen for creating/producing good songs. I always listen to seventeen music whenever I feel down and it really made me lessen my sadness.

Thank you so much SEVENTEEN❤

I really truly throughly totally love this!!! 

Thank you so much for the thoughtful and lovely ideas you guys give to us.

author: @amberbrioso936
text:
Seventeen's us again lyrics hits really hard:<


You can walk comfortably
Someday I’ll make a path for you.
Even though I’m shaking on the waves,
One day, we’re gonna have a lot of waves.

On a strange road
Anyone can get lost
I’ll be with you on the tough road

Until the day we sing together again
This road to you will not be over
For every reason and this length
You’re the one that’s beautiful
At the end of this road, after the turning point
So that you don’t get tired anymore, I’ll…
I’ll protect you
No matter what happens, we…
We’ll see you again.

When you walk in the dark night
Don’t do it yourself, I’m here.
Bright light seeps in, it brightens the darkness

We sing together again, until that day
This path to you will never end
For every reason and this length,
You’re the one that’s beautiful

After the end of this victory and the halfway point,
Don’t get tired anymore, I’ll…
I’ll protect you
No matter what happens, we…
We’ll see each other again.
Let’s take a breath for awhile and then we’ll go back
The hard, kept journey
Finish it and Pace us

Before the morning came then
We’re at our peak
It’s growing up
Come to me, if you’re lost, any time

When you share warm warmth, the road comes back
We’ll find it, you don’t have to be scared
At the end of this road, there’s warmth and a warm smile
They’ll protect us in the Past-paced hours
Let’s slow down for a while.
We’ll see each other again.

author: @katrinamarie6687
text: I listened to this song with 3 with different perspectives of who it's towards: to us, to eachother, and to themselves. All three are true and the same time, I believe. This is a love letter to their futures and to ours, from the past. Have we reached the point in time this song talks about? I truly don't know, and that's what makes it so bitter sweet.  Everything they do is wrapped in the most sincere passion for ones work I've ever seen. I can't claim to know for sure, but I can fee fear in this song, like their is tiny drops of anxiety. They love music and performing so much, it's in their blood and bones, and I think they're afraid of what comes after, once this part of their lives is through, just like us.

author: @sansastark6054
text:
They comfort me in a way my family and friends couldn't. 
It's almost unreal how I feel this unbreakable bond with them.
It's almost like I know them personally. 
I don't see them as boyfriends or whatever Kpop industry tries to sell their artists as but they're more like my support system. 
I want to thank them but that can never be enough. 
I wish I could see them someday. 
I was in a dark place from where I was dubious I could ever return. 
It was them who helped me. 
They somehow got through my thick skull, through all the pain and dark thoughts and made be believe that there's a better place. 
A simple thanks will never be enough I know but till the day we sing together again, I'll be waiting for you at your every step, cheering you, just like you did for me. 
If you ever get lost, we'll wait for you patiently to find your way back to us again. 
We've got your back fam.
This song is so beautiful I want it to imprint on my soul.

author: @lalabsyu6325
text:
When you're so uncertain about your life and what you are doing, you start to doubt everything and gets scared of the future. It feels like you're running out of time and kept running. You're getting tired of it, of everything, of everyone. 



And after hearing this song, tears pooled your eyes and it fell down to your cheeks. These are the words that you've been longing to hear. 


Just rest if you can't catch your breath and that's okay. Believe and walk straightly to the path you've been dreaming. You're not alone, you can hold on to someone's hand. 


You are at your own pace and after a long tiring day, you will be able to smile again. Just like night and day, sunrises and sunsets, the world needs you. 

You will able to meet the one you've been praying for. The YOU of tomorrow.

author: @sarahmarques6693
text:
I'm so emotional rn. this song touched me hard. seventeen has been my healing for four years straight. every time i thought of giving up, they gave me strengh. every time I doubt and hated myself, thay showed me I'm precious and I deserve to be happy too. they mean the whole world to me. i feel loved and special knowing I support these guys. I feel like they became my home after so much support and happiness that was given to me. I can't even express how thankful I am. It's okay to be lost, nothing lasts forever. We'll find our way and enjoy our lives. Living doesn't have to be so heavy and mean. If we stay together and love each other, we'll be able to get through our growing pains and finally treasure our paths. 
"I wanted to be your tomorrow, so I lived today."

author: @lunariyoo_n
text: I just realized that it's their own handwriting in the video. This makes it even more special. I never regret stanning Seventeen 4 months ago. I can't believe that last year, I never knew of them, and now, I can't imagine my life without them. They have indeed created a special place in my heart and I will cherish that till the end of time. I may not be there at the beginning but I can guarantee that I will be there until the very end. Thanks, Seventeen, for making my life better. You guys made me laugh a genuine laugh and I haven't done that in years and I thought I never will. This song really touched my heart and it almost made me cry. It's really comforting to listen to because it lifts off the loneliness that I feel, especially when I read the lyrics. I will continue supporting you through thick and thin. Keep making great and amazing songs and choreographies! 세븐틴 사랑합니다!

author: @everyoneseol
text:
Come to this after a hoshi's reply to carat on wv..
When the time has come, when I'll leave my fangirling life, I will remember SVT as my source of joyfulness, the happiest pills ever, the one who make me smile when my real life hit me hard. And I'm wishing all the happiness in life for them, because once upon a time they were mine.
I don't know wether I'll stay until the last say the name, but SVT and Carat will always be one of the best thing happened to me. I will never regret the day I slipped into this diamond life. And will always remember all the happiness I've been through with SVT. Thank you, I love you..

author: @meganong6010
text:
i'll make a road for you one day 
so that you can walk comfortably
even though we're shaking on top of waves
in the end, we'll be standing on top of the waves
on an unfamiliar path,
anyone can lose their way
i'll be with you even on the rough roads

until the moment we sing together again, until that day
this road that leads to you won't ever end
every reason and path is beautiful
because you are here
at the end of this road, when we pass the turnaround point
so that you won't be exhausted, i'll,
i'll protect you.
even if something happens to us, 
let's meet again.

when we walk through the dark night,
don't worry, i'm here
a bright light shines through the darkness
until the moment we sing together again, until that day
this road that leads to you won't ever end
every reason and path is beautiful
because you are here
at the end of this road, when we pass the turnaround point
so that you won't be exhausted, i'll
i'll protect you.
even if something happens to us, 
we'll meet again.

for a moment, we'll catch our breath, then we'll
finish this hard and exhausting journey and meet each other
before the morning comes,
like we're reaching the peak, we're going through our growing pains 

come to me if you're lost at anytime
when we share our warmth, you''ll be able to
find the road again
you don't have to be afraid
at the end of this road, your warmth and your warm smile will
protect us as the time moves quickly past us
you can slow down a bit. 
still, we'll meet again.

I already saw seventeen on 2018. But I was too focused on gg. Last september 2019, I became a carat. I guess like what they say,

"Still, Let's meet again" because I already met them on 2018

Its destiny

I will love seventeen with all my heart

author: @Warmelia
text: Masih ada yang nangis setiap denger ini? Berarti kita sama. Lagu ini artinya bener bener nyentuh aku secara pribadi. Banyak hal dihidupku yang aku gak tau untuk apa dan mau dibawa kemana, kaya aku udah buntu dan tiba tiba mereka drop lagu ini, beberapa lirik dilagu ini bikin aku kesentil mungkin? Kaya ayok pelan pelan aja kamu bakal ketemu akhir dari perjalanan ini kok tenang aja, jalannya gak akan pernah hilang walaupun waktu nyuruh kamu buru buru. Walaupun apapun itu, kita ada disini. Yg aku tangkep untuk diriku pribadi ya begitu. Jadi aku sangat banyak banyak berterima kasih untuk seventeen, 2020 ku bener bener berat tapi gak bisa aku katakan berat karena ada kalian dan carats semua. Makasih untuk lagu lagu yang menginspirasi kaya lagu us, again ini. Aku mau liat tulisan aku ini lagi 2, 5, 10, 17 tahun lagi. Aku pengen liat diriku lagi nanti dan seventeen yang akan sekeren apa lagi.

author: @monicalucia6980
text:
There will come a day when we can listen to this song without tears, only warm smiles.
They will be on stage, and we'll be cheering our hearts out for them.
There will be hard times before that, there will be turbulance and struggles.
But knowing that good days are ahead, will get us back on our feet. Because they teach us how even in our darkest time, we will never be truly alone.
We will see each other again, thank you seventeen.
Know that when we light up your path, you light ours as well.

Carats ♡

author: @xd-io9sy
text: Words cannot express how much I love SEVENTEEN. At first it was all about just the music, another group to follow, but as the time passed I’ve grown to love not only the music but the people behind the music, too. I love each and every member with all my heart. If there was any other way to show them how much I love them, I will, but for now, I’ll just pour it out in this comment. I AM SO THANKFUL I GOT TO STAN SEVENTEEN. I love you all so much. Thank you for shining a light in my darkest moments and for showing me rainbows when life wasn’t as gloomy. I love you.

너를 향한 이길은 끝나지 않을 거야
모든 이유와 이 길이

이 길의 끝에서 반환점 마저 지나면

내가 널 지켜 줄게

혹여 무슨 일 있어도 우리

걱정하지 마 내가 있잖아
밝은 빛이 스며들어 어둠을 밝혀줘

혹여 무슨 일 있어도 우리

잠시 우리 숨을 고르고 또다시
힘들고 지친 여정을
끝내고 우리 마주해

아침이 오기 전에 그때
절정이 이르듯 우린

나에게로와 길을 헤매고 있다면 언제든

author: @buttersquashfan
text:
Seventeen debuted on May 26 with a live showcase televised by MBC. They were the first male K-pop group to debut with a one-hour live showcase on a major broadcasting channel, with label-mates Lizzy and Raina serving as MCs. Three days later, their first EP 17 Carat was digitally released.17 Carat became the longest-charting K-pop album of the year in the US and was the only rookie album to appear on Billboard's "10 Best K-Pop Albums of 2015" chart.

On September 10 their second EP Boys Be was released, which would later become the highest selling rookie album of 2015. The album's success earned the group awards at the Golden Disk Awards, Seoul Music Awards, and Gaon Chart K-Pop Awards. Seventeen was also the only K-pop group on Billboard's "21 Under 21 2015: Music's Hottest Young Stars" 

Seventeen held a four-date concert series titled 2015 Like Seventeen – Boys Wish from the 24th to the 26th of December as an end-of-year celebration in Seoul. After the concerts' success, Seventeen held two related concerts the following February in 2016, entitled Like Seventeen – Boys Wish Encore Concert.

author: @seventeenrighthere2518
text: I’m here again and this time I’m writing this. The first time I heard this, I was crying non-stop. I can’t imagine when SEVENTEEN will part ways in the future. (I know that idol life is temporary.) SEVENTEEN brought me happiness. They are literally my life saviors when I was facing my downfall during my 15-yrs old self. 5 years later, I’m here being stronger than ever. Thank you SEVENTEEN. I could say ‘thank you’ for endless time but I won’t be tired saying it. 2015 is a bittersweet memory of mine. Behind those darkness, you shone brightly in front of me. I might not be here today if I didn’t hear your music. And I really am thankful I have met these 13 boys. Continue inspiring us, and we will always support you, hard times or not. Thank you from the bottom of my heart.

author: @한초연-h9c
text:
세븐틴도 어두운 밤 걸을 때, 걱정 하지 마. 세봉이들 뒤엔 캐럿이 있잖아. 캐럿이 아름다움이 유지하는 방법은 세븐틴이고, 세븐틴의 아름다움은 우리가 더욱 더 보이게 해줄테니까. 
항상 너희 진심 잘 보고, 듣고 있어. 너희 노래로, 행동 혹은 말로 매일 위로 받은 나고, 세븐틴에게 기대는 나야.
 나에겐 버팀목만 되어주었던 너희가 이제는 맘 편히 나,
 그리고 캐럿들 에게도 기댈 수 있으면 좋겠다. 
맨날 너희가 뭘 해주려 하지 않아도.. 자연스래 캐럿들은 위로도, 칭찬도 받으니까 부족하다 하지마, 제발. 
나를 욕 하는 것 보다 너희가 스스로에게 나쁜 점만 찾아 말을 하는 모습이 더 마음아파.. 
캐럿들은 우리 사이에 무슨 일이 있어도 다시 만날 수 있는 사이고, 그런 사이를 만들어낸게 우리니까.
 멀어진다 두려워 하지 말아줬으면 해. 
지금은 좋은 날이니까, 지금은 그런 일이 없으니까.. 지금은 기뻐하자. 즐거워하고, 항상 웃고 다니자.
 만약 우리가 헤어지더라도, 속도가 달라 멀어지더라도 꼭 만날 수 있을테니, 그래야만 하니. 걱정 하지 말고, 무서워 하지 말고.. 
그 때 일은 그 때 가서 생각하도록! 
이게 쉬운건 아니지만, 그래도 이런 말로 마음이 좀 가벼워 지면 좋겠다. 세븐틴이랑 우리랑 헤어지게 된다면, 
만약 그렇다면 난 이 말을 새기고 살아갈 거야. 
"우리, 다시 서로의 이름을 외치는 그 날까지, 그 날 이후도 너희와 우리를 향해 이어져있는 이 길은 끝나지 않을 거야. 그러니까 조금만 더 기다리자" 
난 우리가 떨어지더라도, 버틸 수 있으니 언젠가는 만날 수 있을거라 믿고 있을게.
항상 고맙고, 미안하고, 사랑한다 세븐틴
오래 가자, 세븐틴 캐럿
_
When Seventeen walks in the dark, don’t worry, there’s a carat behind the Sebongs, because the way she keeps her beauty is Seventeen, and the beauty of Seventeen will make us look even more.
I always see and hear you sincerely, I'm comforted by your songs, by actions or by words, and I'm counting on Seventeen.
You guys, who were the only support to me,
And I wish I could lean on the Carats.
Even if you don't always try to do anything... Naturally, the carats are comforted and praised. Don't be lacking, please.
I feel more sick that you are talking to yourself for the bad thing than to swear at me.
The carats are able to meet again no matter what happens between us, and we have created such a relationship.
I want you not to be afraid of being away.
It's a good day now, so it's not going to happen now. Let's be happy now. Let's be happy, always laughing.
If we break up, we'll meet even if we're moving away, so we have to. Don't worry, don't be afraid.
You should go think about that then!
It's not easy, but I hope this makes me feel lighter. If you and I break up,
If so, I'll live with this word.
"We, until the day we shout each other's names again, this road that continues towards you and us after that day will not end, so let's wait a little longer."
I'll believe that we'll meet someday, even if we fall off, because we can hold on.
I always appreciate it, I'm sorry, I love you, Seventeen
Let's go, Seventeen Carrett
_
七十岁也走在黑暗的夜晚,别担心。塞邦后面有克拉特。克拉特是七十岁,她会让我们看到更多的美丽。
我总是看着你,听着你,你每天都用你的歌曲,你的行动或言语来安慰你,我期待着十七。
对我来说,你现在喜欢我,
我希望我能依靠克拉特。
无论你每天都不想做些什么...自然地,克拉特都没有安慰或赞美,所以不要太短。
比起骂我,你更喜欢自己找坏事。
克拉特可以再次见面,无论我们之间发生什么,我们创造了这样一个关系。
离我远点,我希望你不要害怕。
现在是美好的一天,因为现在没有发生过这样的事。现在我们很高兴。让我们快乐,总是笑。
如果我们分手,即使速度不同,我们也能见面,所以我们应该。不要担心,不要害怕。
去想那时候的事!
这不是容易的,但我想用这个词来减轻我的心。如果他和我们分手,
如果是这样,我会用这个词生活。
“我们,直到我们再次喊叫对方的名字,这条路,从那天起,继续向你和我们,所以我们再等一会儿。”
我相信我们会有一天见面,因为即使我们掉下来,我们也可以坚持下去。
总是谢谢你,对不起,我爱你。
让我们走很长时间,七角洲。

author: @meganong6010
text:
i'll make a road for you one day 
so that you can walk comfortably
even though we're shaking on top of waves
in the end, we'll be standing on top of the waves
on an unfamiliar path,
anyone can lose their way
i'll be with you even on the rough roads

until the moment we sing together again, until that day
this road that leads to you won't ever end
all these reasons and this road are beautiful because you are here
at the end of this road, when we pass the turnaround point
so that you won't be exhausted, i'll,
i'll protect you.
even if something happens to us, 
let's meet again.

when we walk through the dark night,
don't worry, i'm here
a bright light shines through the darkness
until the moment we sing together again, until that day
this road that leads to you won't ever end
all these reasons and this road are beautiful because you are here
at the end of this road, when we pass the turnaround point
so that you won't be exhausted, i'll
i'll protect you.
even if something happens to us, 
we'll meet again.

for a moment, we'll catch our breath, then we'll
finish this hard and exhausting journey and meet each other
before the morning comes,
like we're reaching the peak, we're
experiencing pain from growth

come to me if you're lost at anytime
when we share our warmth, you''ll be able to
find the road again
you don't have to be afraid
at the end of this road, your warmth and your warm smile will
protect us as the time moves quickly past us
even if we slow down for a little while, 
we'll meet again.

author: @kkumup4590
text:
이 노래는 아빠가 보고 싶을 때 항상 힘이 난다는 거 알잖아. 아빠는 다른 도시에서 일하시고 3개월 동안 집에 안 오셨어요. 지난 주에 그는 집에 왔고 우리는 어떠한 격리도 받지 않을 것이기 때문에 서로 싸웠다. 그리고 그가 어디론가 가버리면 나는 그를 그리워하고 죄책감을 느낀다.

 하지만 이 노래로 언젠가 우리가 유행병 이후 다시 만날 것을 알고 나는 그를 껴안고 직접 미안하다고 말할 것이다.
 뭐라고 해야 할지 모르겠지만 세븐틴이 요즘 힘내줘서 고마워.

앞으로 서로 만납시다. 호랑해♥

author: @behindthescreen2906
text:
Right now, I don't think I could go to their concert without thinking about those videos. What I mean is that, it would never gonna be the same anymore. The moment I would watch their concert, I would probably asking myself are they already tired, exhaused, drained? Are they still okay? Their health? I wanna cry. Maybe the moment I watch them performing would never be the same as usual. After watching all those episodes, I would watch them with a heart full of proudness. Eyes covered with tears of joy and a mouth shouting how proud I am for them. We always saw SVT performing full of joy and happiness and seeing these whole thing—behind their successful performances, changes my perspective. These precious being deserve the whole damn universe. Thank you for letting us saw these other sides of yours, for showing us all you have gone through. For showing us how you are still fighting and giving all that you've got for you're gems—the carats. Now I can see clearly how those tears and sweats washed their ships to where they are today. All those hard works will surely gonna paid off. Keep soaring high, my Angels

Now, I fell harder the second way a round. I think, I am already drowning too deep, falling too hard. SVT would be the greatest fall that I would gladly take to risk at and I don't think I need saving anymore.

I used to cut my own skin because of depression and whenever my anxiety attacking me, I'm just going to listen to their song that really comfort me and cry while listening to it. And this song makes me cry so bad, it is not because that it is bad but because how beaitiful the meaning of it and how they put their emotion to make this song really incredible. I am thankful that I  discovered them but deeply sorry for being late to know them, I am sorry for this very long comment.

author: @lune_17
text:
네가 편히 걸을 수 있도록
언젠가 널 위한 길을 만들어줄거야

파도 위에서 흔들리고 있어도
훗날 우린 파도를 밟고 서있을거야

낯선 길 위에서 
누구나 길을 잃어버릴 수 있어
험난한 길도 내가 함께할테니

우리 다시 함께 노래하는 그 때 그 날까지
너를 향한 이 길은 끝나지 않을거야

모든 이유와 이 길이 
아름다운 건 네가 있어서

이 길의 끝에서 반환점마저 지나면
네가 더는 지치지 않게 내가
내가 널 지켜줄게
혹여 무슨 일 있어도 우리
다시 꼭 만나자

어두운 밤을 걸을 때
걱정하지마 내가 있잖아
밝은 빛이 스며들어 어둠을 밝혀줘

우리 다시 함께 노래하는 그 때 그 날까지
너를 향한 이 길은 끝나지 않을거야

모든 이유와 이 길이
아름다운 건 네가 있어서

이 길의 끝에서 반환점마저 지나면
네가 더는 지치지 않게 내가
내가 널 지켜줄게

혹여 무슨 일 있어도 우리
다시 만날거야

잠시 우리 숨을 고르고 또다시
힘들고 지친 여정을 끝내고 우리 마주해
아침이 오기 전에 그 때
절정이 이르듯 우린
성장통을 겪고 있는거야
나에게로와 길을 헤메고 있다면 언제든
따스한 온기를 나누면 길을 다시금
찾을 수 있을테니까 
겁내지 않아도 괜찮아

이 길의 끝에 온기와 따뜻한 미소가
빠르게 지나가는 시간 속에 우릴 지켜줄거야

잠시 속도를 늦춰도 우리
다시 만날거야

author: @giselanadine3859
text: I love how they use the same words from each of their episodes quotes and it's really cute and beautiful. I love this song so much it made my cry for a whole night thinking about their hardships trough the years until now they've succeed for being an amazing idol who inspires a lot of people, and also helped a lot of people who's having a hard time by their songs. They really deserve the world and all the love in this world, they deserve better. So CARATS let's support them no matter what and by that I mean let's support them until the last 'say the name' and of course we don't want that day to come but the reality is they will all have wife and kids that they love with all their hearts and they'll stop singing, dancing, and rapping. They'll also stop having concerts and fan signs. They'll stop performing together and start to focus on their own family. You probably don't wanna think about it, so do I. But please if that day has come please never forget that they're once the reason that we laughed and cried. I just wanna say please don't ever forget about them because they've done so much for us and we should too even though there's not much things we could do right now, and every little things we did for them they'll be very happy or touched even though we only did these little things, but that little things could be so meaningful for them. We love you SEVENTEEN! Thank you for reading :)

author: @quack-yi1cq
text:
네가 편히 걸을 수 있도록

언젠가 널 위한 길을 만들어 줄거야

파도 위에서 흔들리고 있어도

훗날 우린 파도를 밟고 서 있을 거야

낯선 길 위에서 누구나 길을 잃어버릴 수 있어

험난한 길도 내가 함께할 테니

우리 다시 함께 노래하는 그때 그 날까지

너를 향한 이 길은 끝나지 않을 거야

모든 이유와 이 길이

아름다운 건 네가 있어서

이 길의 끝에서 반환점 마저 지나면

네가 더는 지치지 않게 내가

내가 널 지켜줄게

혹여 무슨 일 있어도 우리

다시 꼭 만나자

어두운 밤을 걸을 때

걱정하지 마 내가 있잖아

밝은 빛이 스며들어 어둠을 밝혀줘

우리 다시 함께 노래하는 그때 그날까지

너를 향한 이 길은 끝나지 않을 거야

모든 이유와 이 길이

아름다운 건 네가 있어서

이 길의 끝에서 반환점 마저 지나면

네가 더는 지치지 않게 내가

내가 널 지켜줄게

혹여 무슨 일 있어도 우리

다시 만날 거야.

잠시 우리 숨을 고르고 또 다시

힘들고 지친 여정을

끝내고 우리 마주해

아침이 오기 전에 그때

절정이 이르듯 우린

성장통을 겪고 있는 거야.

나에게로 와 길을 헤매고 있다면 언제든

따스한 온기를 나누며 길을 다시금

찾을 수 있을 테니까

겁내지 않아도 괜찮아

이 길의 끝에 온기와 따듯한 미소가

빠르게 지나가는 시간 속에 우릴 지켜줄 거야

잠시 속도를 늦춰도 우리,

다시 만날 거야.

author: @coupalatte
text:
someone who's not in this comment section pointed out how each members have improved their vocal technique and yes i agree a lot ;; specially if you have seen them live or seen their live video on youtube such as fancam from concerts.. so i'm just here to say and in hope seventeen will see this; i'm so proud to be a fan of seventeen, to be a carat. even after all these years, even after svt have come so far, they never stopped learning and improving. they never think that everything is enough already. which is really a great example for me and so impressive aaahh i really adore and have my whole heart for seventeen... T-T please never stop being carat's pride (i hope this doesn't come off as a burden tho ;; ....) and know that i am forever grateful to have live at the same time and place where all thirteen of you exist. T-T

let's all stay healthy and safe so we can still be with each other together, all 13 of seventeen and all carats all over the world, for a long long long time! ❤︎ ;;-;;

author: @imcheonga
text: I have symptoms of depression and overthinking, and my environment doesn't support me to recover. and the day before this song appeared the disease recurred again and it hurts me very much... I cried a lot and felt tired with life. I can only pray to God to give me medicine for all this. And it turns out this song appears tomorrow omg. I was very touched and cried a lot. I feel my heart healed by them. I feel like I'm not alone in this 'road', I'm very grateful to be in this fandom with seventeen and carats who give love to each other sincerely and become a home for each other. Thank you so much, y'all saved me^^

author: @guardianprincess9769
text:
it's 20XX, they stand together in one stage, 13 of them are there, facing their fans with a warm smile. that day is their last concert, they are no longer an idol group anymore after this. they are growing old, some of them are still continuing their carreer as a veteran singer and veteran actor, meanwhile some other are handling their business company from home, watching their child and grandchild living happily with them as a full family, etc. the last stage is this song, Us, Again. many days, months, and years have passed away since the first time they released this hurt-comforting song out on June, 8 2020. no matter how long time has passed they are still singing this song with the same feeling, like back then, when they were still strong and young. but this time, they give their all out to sing this song once again, as this farewell will never happened, for the very last time. but one thing for sure is we all know that like what they have always said is "whatever happen to us, we will meet again." they shout their last say the name, seventeen, with a deep-long bow. no words needed, their strong intertwined fingers explain them all. and the lighting goes black, the curtain is closed. the travel is ended here finally, but the journey would never.
-061020, jun's 24 bday, 2.08 AM

text:
Listening this song at 1.5x speed and to be honest it gives a different vibe....it makes me think that will all these things last forever, will everything fade away that matters to me at this speed, will I be alone again or something new will happen.


Listening to this song made me realize what "caring" and "not to be forgotten" actually means. Indeed it means alot. 

I will remember seventeen and my other bias grips forever since they are my reason to laugh, cry and love in my youth.

I love these boys to the moon and back. I've been their fan since i got into kpop in 2015, and they've gotten me through it all and always seem to be there when I need them most. author: @farahnajwa6032
text:
This song really hit me. My life is been so hectic in the pass month and I have been myself lately. I've push away all of my friends and loves one. And I feel alone alone.

After hearing this song made me realize that I am not alone. I have seventeen. Those words really gave me comfort that whenever I need someone, they are here for me. I love them with all of my heart and I will never push them away. I will always support them. I will always love them. I will work hard for them.

SEVENTEEN to me is comfort and reassurance. They will always be there for me and I will always be there for them. Until the last Say The Name

author: @가영-k2l
text:
세븐틴 오빠야들 안녕하세요!
저는 솔직히 아이돌 덕질하는 것을 이해를 못했는데... 세븐틴이라 세븐틴 승철.정한.지수.준휘.순영.원우.지훈.명호.민규.석민.승관.한솔.찬 오빠들이 여서 제 인생에 아이돌이 있게 되었고 제 인생에서 처음이자 마지막으로 좋아하게될 아이돌 오빠들이 생겼어요.
그리고 제가 세븐틴을 좋아하는 이유는 아주아주너무너무 많이 있지만..  그중에서는 노력을 정말 많이 하는 그룹이며 언제든 팬을 생각해주는 마음 또 노래.무대.무대를 즐기는 오빠들 그냥 모든 것이 좋아요!!
오빠들 저는 오빠들이 부담감은 조금 덜어내고 이때까지 해왔는 것처럼 하면 좋겠어요.그래도 우리 캐럿들은 세븐틴을 좋아할꺼에요!
그러니 조금은 쉬엄쉬엄 하셔도 돼요!
우리는 서로만 믿는거잖아요!!
그러니 오빠들도 우리를 기대고 믿어줘요!
어디 가지 않을께요! 한눈 팔지 않을께요!
그러니 믿어줘요~
우리 세븐틴 오빠들은 잘하고 있어요!!!정말정말 잘하고 있어요!!
오빠들 정말정말 대뷔해줘서 정말 정말 고맙고요 만약 아주만약에 진짜진짜 만약에 이 글을 본다고하면 부담이 아니라 응원의 글로만 생각해주세요(내가 오빠들을 사랑하는..글이라고도 생각해주세요...) 근데 정말 이 글이 부담이 안되길 바래요!!😁
우리 항상 서로만 믿고가요!
그리고 우리늘 그렇듯 웃음꽃 피워요!😁
마지막으로 코로나 조심하시구요 아무도 다치지 말아주세요(오빠들 다치면 내마음이 많이 아파...😭)그러니 아프지도 다치지도 마세요!
                      ~세븐틴을 좋아하는것도 모자라 사랑하는 수많은 캐럿들💎중 한명 올림~

author: @adi-eb3yk
text:
네가 편히 걸을 수 있도록
언젠가 널 위핸 길을 만들어 줄 거야
파도위에서 흔들리고 있어도
훗날 우린 파도를 밟고 서 있을거야

낯선 길 위에서
누구나 길 잃어 버릴 수 있어
험난한 길도 내가 함께할 테니

우리 다시 함께노래하는 그때, 그날까지
너를 향한 이길은 끝나지 않을 거야
모든 이유와 이 길이
아름다운 건 네가 있어서

이 길의 끝에서 반환점 마저 지나면
네가 더는 지치지 않게 내가
내가 널 지켜 줄게
혹여 무슨 일 있어도 우리
다시 꼭 만나자…
어두운 밤을 걸을 때
걱정하지 마 내가 있잖아
밝은 빛이 스며들어 어둠을 밝혀줘

우리 다시 함께노래하는 그때, 그날까지
너를 향한 이길은 끝나지 않을 거야
모든 이유와 이 길이
아톰다운 건 네가 있어서

이 길의 끝에서 반환점 마저 지나면
네가 더는 지치지 않게 내가
내가 널 지켜 줄게
혹여 무슨 일 있어도 우리
다시 만날 거야…

잠시 우리 숨을 고르고 또다시
힘들고 지친 여정을
끝내고 우리 마주해
아침이 오기 전에 그때
절정이 이르듯 우린
성장통을 겪고 있는 거야

나에게로와 길을 헤매고 있다면 언제든
따스한 온기를 나누면 길을 다시금
찾을 수 있을 테 니까
겁내지 않아도 괜찮아

이길의 끝에 온기와 따뜻한 미소가
빠르게 지나가는 시간 속에
우릴 지켜 줄 거야
잠시 속도를 늦춰도 우리
다시 만날 거야…

text: 7号晚上第一次听这首歌，才听到第二句我的眼泪就爆发了。（前几遍都没敢仔细看歌词。）是的，现在的困难都不过是成长痛而已。谢谢你们给了我勇气独自一人到异国他乡追寻理想，谢谢你们让我人生第一次对一件事倾注了那么多的热情。你们陪我度过了每一个难过的夜晚，让我依然能笑着迎接第二天的清晨。我们，没有终点。我们会再次相遇。

author: @crymealiver5078
text:
This being the last MV uploaded on their channel is very significant. With all the changes regarding their company, I think they want to remind us with "Us, Again" that everything is still between us, Seventeen and Carats. The handwritten lyrics by the members in this vid is their way to deliver their sincerity, and the background image is just Seventeen and Carats. An assurance that nothing will change and that whatever happens, we will walk this road together forever.

Seventeen, my lovely boys, please know that you always have our hearts and support. Keep making music that makes you happy! We love you.~

author: @natashairdina5359
text:
I'm a carat for 2 years now, and I never regret slipping into this diamond life. This is where I found my real self, I found my friend that always supporting what I loves, that's it, Carat. We share our problems together. 

And the day when Us Again released, I was in mentally unstable, I was crying for the whole day and then when I listen to Us Again, I was crying too, but crying in happiness, the lyrics and the music comforts me. That's the power of Svt's music. I really meant it. Seventeen has a special place in my heart, Thankyou for always being my source of happiness.

p/s:im sorry for my bad english, english is not my first language but i'll try improve it ;)

author: @asthelilygrows4430
text: I've been a fan of kpop for more than ten years now -- taking a couple of breaks along the way. Discovering SEVENTEEN, their music, their brotherhood - everything about them at this point in my life must have been fate. I've met them as I entered adulthood and their music resonated to me on a deeper level. You just feel how much they take time to create music that will comfort their fans. Even without understanding the words behind Us, Again before - I can feel the sincerity in their voices. I can feel how much they care for their fans.  Hearing someone sing to you how it's okay to slow down, how it's normal to experience low points in your life -- it's okay because at the end we as carats always have seventeen. I just hope they really know and feel that same goes for them -- even after the last "say the name", we'll be there for them. We don't know where life will take us but being able to share these memories with SEVENTEEN. I know we'll always have each other. I'll gladly stay to go on this journey with 13 wonderful human beings. SEVENTEEN, thank you for conveying your thoughts, and opening up your feelings to us. Thank you for being our home, a warm blanket that hugs us at the end of each day.

author: @not-identified
text:
I'm one that doesn't stream or do much online, i have my reasons but i do buy their albums and went to their latest concert.  
I just love how CARATs genuinely support and feel their music, how we appreciate both the group and the staff behind them. Because for a lot of other groups (mainly the popular or somewhat mainstream boy groups) when i watch the comments on their MVs all i see is the words 'stream/streaming' and 'views'. Is okay to do those, sometimes for x amount of views in some vids we get special content or something. But seeing how "obsessed" in a way certain fandoms are about such things makes me think that they don't really care for the quality of the MVs, the songs and/or how much effort by the artist and staff was put into making them. Which is a pity. I scroll so much until i read comments saying how the person felt listening to the song, something about the music video or anything that is not about how they didn't reach 1 million views in 5 minutes after the video was dropped.

text: 오빠들 진짜 오빠들이 행복하길 바래요.. 진짜 오빠들이 힘든모습들 보면 매일 울것같아요.. 오빠들의 목소리듣고 겨우살아가고있는데.. 진짜 오빠들 힘내길바래요.. 벌써 세븐틴이란 아주 멋있는 그룹을 좋아한지 3~4년이 다가네요..? 진짜 오빠들은 그 누구에게도 멋있는사람이었어요.. 오빠들 힘들면 우리 캐럿들한테 아주 아주 조금이라도 기대주세요.. 진짜 우리 다시 예전으로 돌아가면 좋을텐데 진짜 더 좋은 추억많이 쌓을수있을텐데.. 캐럿들은 오빠들 진짜 너무너무 응원하고있어요.. 진짜 해체안했으면 좋겠어요.. 오빠들 아니면 아이돌 좋아하는거 포기할려구요...ㅎ 사랑해요..❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️ 늘사랑해요❤️❤️❤️ 진짜 너무 보고싶어요.. 코로나 이겨내고 밝은 모습많이 보여줘요...ㅎㅎ 진짜 사랑하고 고마워요.. 힘든모습안보여주고 좋은모습만 보여주기 힘든데 좋은모습만 보여주니까 전 마음이 조금 아파요.. 힘든모습을 조금이라도 보이게 되면 오빠들 도와주고싶어요... 진짜 너무너무 사랑해요 진짜 오빠들아니면 힘낼것도없어요... 예전 영상들 많이 보고있는데 한결같은 모습보여줘서 고마워요.. 진짜 사랑해요 사랑한다는 말로 표현할수없을만큼 좋아하고 사랑해요.. 이글을 본다면 진짜 좋겠지만 못보겠죠..? 진짜 너무너무 보고싶고 사랑해요.. 오빠들 기죽지말고 하고싶은거해요.. 뭘하든 저는 기다릴자신있어요.. 힘들면 조금 쉬다와도되요.. 저는 그렇게 생각해요.. 이번 컴백이 제생일 2틀뒤에 나오더라구요..ㅎ 진짜 고마워요.. 그냥 다.. 진짜 오빠들의 어떤모습이든 과거든 다 너무좋아요.. 오빠들이 뭐든털어놓으면 들어주고싶어요.. 들어주는것만으로도 힘이나잖아요.. 진짜 고맙고 사랑해요.. 그리고 오늘 준오빠 생일이던데 생일축하해요❤️❤️ 태어나줘서 고마워요 진짜 너무 고마워요 세븐틴이라는 멋진그룹때문에 힘많이 얻었어요.. 그래서 그 얻은힘을 보답하기위해 오빠들 많이 사랑하고 좋아하려구요.. 진짜 너무 보고싶고 고맙고 사랑해요.. 왜 전 이곡을 지금 많이듣고있는데 왜 꼭 오빠들이 떠날것같은거죠..? 아니죠..? 아니였으면 좋겠어요.. 진짜 사랑해요 진짜 너무 고마워요 진짜 그냥 뭐든게 다 태어나줘서 진짜 고마워요... 제발 진짜 왜 이곡을 들으면 세븐틴이라는 그룹이 한순간에 없어질것같죠..? 그건 진짜 싫은데.. 진짜 오빠들이 이글보면 좋겠네요.. 제소원 다 이룬거나 다름없네요..ㅎ 진짜 해체할건아니죠..? 진짜 사랑해요 고마워요.. 수고많았어요.. 고맙고 또 고맙고 사랑하고 또 사랑해요.. 진짜 왜 이곡들으면 왜 제 눈앞에서 금방사라질것같은거죠..? 진짜... 진짜... 떠나면 진짜 너무 싫어요.. 진짜ㅜㅜ 진짜 원우오빠 파트에서 ‘다시만날거야’ 이파트때문에 몇번째 우는지 모르겠네요.. 진짜 사랑하고 고맙고 수고 많았어요.. 우리 세븐틴 오래갈거잖아요 그렇죠..? 사랑해요 진짜 너무 말할수없을만큼 사랑해요.. 만약 언젠가는 해체하겠지만.. 상상하기 싫지만 만약 그렇게 된다면... 가사처럼 ‘다시 꼭 만나자’ 진짜 다시 꼭 만나야되요.. 알겠죠..? 진짜 사랑해요 고마워요 수고많았어요.. 이글을 읽는다면 진짜 좋을텐데 꿈을 꾸지도 않을려구요.. 수많은 댓글중 제댓글을 보면 진짜 좋을테지만... 사랑해요... 진짜 사랑해요.. 이 글 적은거 모두다 제 진심이에요.. 사랑해요.. 고마워요.. 수고많았어요...ㅎ

author: @princessmouton1636
text:
I was supposed to see them live on stage in March, but guess what, it got canceled. During two years, my only will to live was to see them, meet them, see them at least once with my own eyes, during two years I stayed alive, stayed nice with my parents just to see them. I cried of happiness when my mom fought with my dad so he would buy me tickets for the concert in Paris. I know it would cost a lot of money, I knew it was only a child's dream, I know that to them it didn't mean anything, during these two years I could have asked me to take me to at least 4 concerts of différents kpop groups that I Stan, but I didn't even mentioned it to them, Seventeen would be the first kpop group that I was going to see on stage, they were the reason me moving and leaving all of my friends was bearable and this concert was considered pointles by my dad which I love and appreciate. I cried for 2 days of happiness, and told everyone that I was going to see them, only for it to be canceled.
I know it was for the sake of everyone, the members, the stafs, and especially carats and I'm glad they did but at the same time, it broke my heart. Now I will continue to live in hope of seeing them one day.
To every carat, and to every members of seventeen, I hope we can meet one day, and thank you for making me happy through a screen!

author: @deanned1778
text: Been a Carat for less than a year and even though I’m a bit disappointed in myself that I haven’t supported them since day 1 like how they deserved to be, I’m so happy to love and support these pure angels. I’ve never had such a strong connection with a group like how I connected with Seventeen. I’ve been suffering from panic and anxiety attacks and their songs have helped me a lot during those ordeals. Listening to this song uplifts my heart and heals my soul. Thank you, Seventeen. Whatever happens to all of us, I know I’ll always find my way back to you. Can’t wait for the day that we meet again. We will meet again. 💎

author: @noyayuu3651
text: Terima kasih untuk SEVENTEEN. Sebelumnya saya tidak kenal seventeen. Saya bukan kpopers. Tapi setelah mendengar lagu ini (dengan terjemahan) aku menangis. Kehilangan pekerjaan karena covid19, diputuskan ex-boyfriend dan dia memilih menikah dengan wanita lain padahal sudah pacaran lebih dari 5 tahun, hutang yang menumpuk, dikhianati sahabat yang Aku percaya. Hampir saja aku depresi. Tidak ada seseorangpun disampingku. Duniaku seakan runtuh. Bahkan aku sudah memikirkan banyak cara untuk mengakhiri hidup. Semua terasa menyakitkan. Aku lelah. Aku ingin berhenti hidup. Sampai aku menemukan lagu ini. Terima kasih. Lagu ini menyemangatiku. Aku merasa hangat. Aku mulai mengerti ternyata dunia ini luas. Aku akan berusaha lebih baik lagi. Terima kasih seventeen.

author: @ariannaxcolarte
text: if you were to ask me 4 and a half years ago when i first stanned them, i wouldnt have guessed that these ANGELS would have such a big impact on me, especially not knowing what was going to happen throughout these years. last september, i started high school, being clueless about the situations that were going to come in the next couple of months. i always found myself listening to their songs (at like 2am) crying (or having a dance party) at the lyrics because they were full of so much meaning. even though they don't know who i am, i promised myself that i would be able to see them one day. i always feel so loved whenever i just think about them, cause like LOOK AT THEM, they put so much effort to make sure that WE ARE HAPPY. if i could say all the things i would wanna say, this comment (lol its a book now) would be SOO long and filled with really dumb stories. ilysm and THANK YOU FOR LETTING ME CRY WHEN I NEED TO

author: @jz_es.469
text:
I haven't watched every Hit The Road ep cause it just slipped out my mind after losing my laptop. I just borrow gadgets from my family so I don't watch Youtube as much as before. I don't prioritize Kpop as it's not the only thing I'm interested at so I don't watch everything my bias groups put out. I know I don't get to put too much effort but that doesn't change my love for SEVENTEEN and my other bias groups. They make me happy and have been a great impact in my life. I didn't turn perfect after stanning them of course it just made me think about myself more and about my life which I've been so scared to do cause I'm messed up. I love Seventeen but all the things they've been doing seems to pass my radar and even if I get to acknoweledge it, it seems like whatever I do isn't enough for them. I love Seventeen I really do and I just hope I could be better for them cause they deserve so much 

-💓💜💞

author: @yudhistiramahasena1255
text:
I feel sorry for those who don't stan Seventeen. I have been a Carat since Seventeen debuted, and they worked hard before debuting. S.Coups was one of the OG Pledis boys and was supposed to debut with NU'EST in 2012, but the plans were later cancelled. Then he and Woozi were supposed to be in the group Tempest, but again the plans were cancelled. 2015 was the year he became the leader of the self-producing kings we know and love today.

Seventeen is not just S.Coups, Jeonghan, Joshua, Jun, Hoshi, Wonwoo, Woozi, DK, Mingyu, The8, Seungkwan, Vernon, and Dino.
*Seventeen is 13 or none.*

text:
_D-14kst till SEVENTEEN'S comeback and D-2kst till uri Junnie birthday_

It's sad we were not able to reach 1million v17ws, but the fact that some of us were so determined to achieve it made me believe that we Carats can improve in str17ming together, instead of calling eachother lazy, angry at pledis better practice str17ming because while str17ming we are doing this for SEVENTEEN'S happiness. I won't be able to buy any albums not now maybe in the future but I'll try to do better in str17ming,votings and tagging them and I know that I'm not alone, I know some dedicated Carat's here. So let's all walk this flower path together. 

I'll still str17m Seventeen's songs no matter where it is posted 
[REMINDER] 
Str17m uri Myunghu's falling down.
Str17m uri Dino's dancelogy. 
Str17m uri Jun Down in sandbar cover too
And do watch HIT THE ROAD episodes and cry regularly.
Str17m SNAPSHOOT. 
Do download the voting apps!! 

Hwaiting lovely fam-

author: @janeler
text:
Through these rough days I've been going through right now, I am so glad there's SEVENTEEN♡

"To help you walk with no trouble, I'll pave a road for you someday"

These days where I feel really restless, they came and reminded me I'm not alone.

"On the strange road,  anyone can be lost. I'll be with you on the rocky way"

With these thoughts, even though I know I am just a fan against millions, I believe in our hearts we reciprocate these feelings..

"Every reason and path, is beautiful because of you."

And no matter how hard the days are, I know a part of me gets strength to keep going through them and their music.

"If we pass the turning point at the end of the road, I will protect you so you won't be worn out anymore."

So I hope one day, all will be better and I can finally say "I'm sincerely happy now and you helped me a lot". Until then, with brightest smiles and hearts filled with joy,

"Whatever happens to us, Let's meet again."

author: @msmsmsms1
text:
I want to tell this story to you. I have a friend, an internet friend to be exact. He was alone at the moment since he was quarantined somewhere far from his family because of covid 19. I met him like just a week ago and I became fond of him immediately. Then, we chatted each other almost everyday and I learned he is depressed and suicidal. Yesterday, the day where this song released was also his birthday and the sad part is that his whole family forgot about it. He called them to tell them that it’s his 15th birthday but his family never cared. He was so sad and was about to end his life by overdosing his pills. Then, the time he told me his plan, this song was released. There, I was anxious about it and after hearing this song, I wanted to send this to him to rethink. He is a fan of one direction and he somewhat not fond of kpop that’s why I was anxious if I should send this to him or nah. In the end, I managed to send this song to him and I told him to listen to it. 

After a few hours, he chatted me, “thank you for this heartwarming song” and I felt relieved. I was anxious before he chatted me back because I told him if he was planning to end his life, please listen this song that could change your mind. He actually sent me a long message but he thanked me for the song recommendation. He told me he doesn’t understand a single thing but somehow it felt like the song is telling him to keep on living. He also apologized to me and all. Nonetheless, I’m so glad he decided to keep on living. Right now, he is trying his best to be positive and I’m so glad. He might not be a carat but this song moved him so much.

author: @mimi-nx1mj
text:
I've been stanning these boys for about 3-4 years and I always ask myself, "How and Why did I fell in love with these boys?" I, myself cannot answer the question. I can't even remember the first time I saw them. Was it the time my friend introduced me to Seventeen? Was it the time I was watching their mvs? I dont know, maybe it's because of their catchy songs and dorky attitudes. Then Us, Again started playing, and I suddenly knew why I fell in love with Seventeen. It's not just their songs, their attitudes and performance. It's the amount of hard work and feelings that they put into their songs and choreos. The comfort that they give us through the lyrics of their song is enough to make us feel calm and safe.

Our boys may not be as popular like other groups, but this I promise you: I will stay till the end and beyond the end. I will stay as a solid carat no matter what happens. Seventeen will be my kings forever and more♡.

author: @ChildOfHalit
text:
*SEVENTEEN COMEBACK ON JUNE 22!!!!*

UPDATE: *MUSIC VIDEOS* and *TEASERS* will be *UPLOADED* in *BIGHIT LABELS*

Let's make this their best comeback yet. I hope we could all set goals that we can all work together to reach. The past weeks have been quite bumpy for us, and more dramas will probably come out as we approach comeback season, but I hope they won't stray you from what is important to us and that is *SEVENTEEN* . We will support this comeback and their MVs (wherever they would be posted). 

Kcarats have started planning for the comeback. And i hope everyone knows that they will go all-out for this. So i hope icarats can also support and give our best for this. 

GOALS:
*1M PRE ORDERS OF THE UPCOMING ALBUM OF THE YEAR!!!*
*10 MILLION vi3ws for the MV in the first 24 hours*

CARATS, FIGHTING!

author: @wonumoni1457
text:
I'm a carat for less than a year and Seventeen is probably the first group I feel such a huge connection. They are my diamonds, my love, my day, my dawn, my one and only seventeen. As Minghao said "Seventeen is my youth" and they really are. They've taught me how to grow up, how to be happy and how to never give up of my dreams. I can't put in words how much they mean to me, is literally impossible. Like my life: I can't describe all my life without missing something. Same goes for my love for Seventeen: I can't describe it all without missing something.
My path will always be easy and cheerful if I'm with you. 
Thank you for everything, i will be always by your side 사랑해 <3

author: @jjsainte
text:
Dear Seventeen,
MANSAE! This song HIT me again. I keep saying that I DON'T WANNA CRY, but OH MY! I just did and my heart went BOOM BOOM. To say that it's VERY NICE is an understatement, and it deserved more than a CLAP. This song made me want to ADORE U more. It showed how PRETTY U are, your songs, your hearts. THANKS for inspiring a lot of carats, including me (of course). I wish that I could make a CALL CALL CALL so I could tell you these. FEAR? Anxiety? Depression? You made those things disappear gradually like a FALLIN' FLOWER. You're the HOME of every lonely heart, you're the comfort of every bewildered soul.

This is an oath: I promise to take the road with you until the last say the name. I will take the road with you, be it rocky or concrete. Together, with you and my fellow carats, we will have our HAPPY ENDING. Things may separate us at some point, but a song is enough to get us back again. Just one melody from you guys and I already know we're GETTING CLOSER towards each other. And I, I solemnly swear that no matter how many years would get by, it would forever be US, AGAIN.

Aku berharap kita akan terus bersama sebagai Seventeen dan Carat. Aku berharap Seventeen selalu bahagia, terima kasih selalu berusaha untuk menjadi yang terbaik bagi Carat. Selalu jaga kesehatan, jangan lupa makan dan istirahat. Aku sayang kalian

author: @svtcarat8816
text: i've said this a lot of times now but seventeen has really made such a huge impact on my life. there were times that i would randomly have anxiety attacks and just cry endlessly, but seventeen has always comforted me through their songs. just recently, i have been crying for weeks thinking that i'm not doing enough, that things are not going my way, and that everything is just not working. everyone else is doing fine on their own, yet here i am. stuck, lost, and left behind. i have been doubting my self worth, thoughts of giving up have flooded my mind. but then seventeen released this. it's like they really know how and when to comfort me. they literally saved me. this is exactly what i needed to hear. someone reassuring me that they would be there by my side, no matter what happens. that although life may be hard, although we get lost sometimes, seventeen would always be there. so thank you, seventeen. for telling me how the sky is always the darkest before sunrise. for giving me hope that we'll eventually find our way back. thank you for being my home.

modeun iyuwa i giri

i girui kkeuteseo banhwanjeom majeo jinamyeon
nega deoneun jichiji anhge naega
naega neol jikyeo julge
hogyeo museun il isseodo uri
dasi mannal geoya…

jamsi uri sumeul goreugo ttodasi
himdeulgo jichin yeojeongeul
kkeutnaego uri majuhae
achimi ogi jeone geuttae
jeoljeongi ireudeut urin
seongjangtongeul gyeokkgo issneun geoya

naegerowa gireul hemaego issdamyeon eonjedeun
ttaseuhan ongireul nanumyeon gireul dasigeum
chajeul su isseul te nikka

igirui kkeute ongiwa ttatteushan misoga

-----
[English transation]

You can walk comfortably
Someday I’ll make a path for you.
Even though I’m shaking on the waves,
One day, we’re gonna have a lot of waves.

On a strange road
Anyone can get lost
I’ll be with you on the tough road

Until the day we sing together again
This road to you will not be over
For every reason and this length
You’re the one that’s beautiful
At the end of this road, after the turning point
So that you don’t get tired anymore, I’ll…
I’ll protect you
No matter what happens, we…
We’ll see you again.

When you walk in the dark night
Don’t do it yourself, I’m here.
Bright light seeps in, it brightens the darkness

We sing together again, until that day
This path to you will never end
For every reason and this length,
You’re the one that’s beautiful

After the end of this victory and the halfway point,
Don’t get tired anymore, I’ll…
I’ll protect you
No matter what happens, we…
We’ll see each other again.
Let’s take a breath for awhile and then we’ll go back
The hard, kept journey
Finish it and Pace us

Before the morning came then
We’re at our peak
It’s growing up
Come to me, if you’re lost, any time

When you share warm warmth, the road comes back
We’ll find it, you don’t have to be scared
At the end of this road, there’s warmth and a warm smile
They’ll protect us in the Past-paced hours
Let’s slow down for a while.
We’ll see each other again.

text: It's been 1 year since I stan this idols. My friend recommended them to me and I'm always thankful to my friend because I was able to stan them. Honestly, I'm not a big fan of so many member idol group cause it makes me confused but for Seventeen, it made an exemption. I don't have to worry looking at my bias cause for Seventeen, you will never have a bias. Like all of them is your bias. Hahaha. For now, I'm really thankful and appreciate this song. This was my running playlist the whole day and will always be. Thank you, Seventeen. Thank you for all of your hardwork. We love you all and will support you forever. 💙💎

author: @sylviamanpioper9068
text: Dear SEVENTEEN, sudah setahun ini aku mengenal kalian dan pertama kali aku merasa bangga dengan pilihanku untuk mencintai orang lain sedalam ini, aku mudah menangis ketika melihat kalian kesakitan atau aku membaca komen yang menjatuhkan kalian... Aku selalu tertawa menonton gose sebagai hiburan dan healing bagiku dengan kehidupanku yang berat, ketika kalian melakukan tour amerika aku sedang berada di masa kelas 9 dimana kegiatan padat banget, aku bahkan absen nonton gose dan konten lainnya, aku pulang sekolah hanya sempat liat berita kalian beberapa menit dan ketika ku melihat berita ada member yang sakit aku hanya bisa menangis sambil menguatkan diriku untuk lanjut mengerjakan tugas, namun ketika rest aku juga rest, aku bahagia karena dari pandemi ini aku tidak melakukan ujian nasional namun aku selalu menangis mengingat bahwa konser kalian tertunda, japan dome tour yang batal... Bahkan aku melihat idol lain yang sudah berhasil melakukan japan dome tour air mata jatuh tanpa diundang... Namun ketika kalian mulai bekerja untuk comeback aku juga mulai kembali ke aktivitasku belajar dan belajar.. Melihat carat lain yang berhasil bertemu dengan kalian aku semakin terpacu untuk lebih keras dengan belajar dan bisa bertemu kalian tidak lupa aku berdoa sebab tidak ada yang mustahil di mata TUHAN. Kiranya TUHAN selalu memberkati kita..dan  sudah sejam dari lagu ini rilis maaf tidak bisa menaklukan satu juta, tapi aku rasa berapapun tidak akan mengurangi cinta kalian untuk carat, carat juga kokk okeh ini ntar jadi cerpen

author: @wolfyagriche7530
text:
Thank you, thank you very much, seventeen😊

Maybe the word Thank you is not enough to express the gratitude I met you all.
But really I am very very thankful because 5 years ago I had experienced severe depression but at that moment I met you guys for the first time, Seventeen.

Seeing you always working hard, always smiling, and not giving up makes me cry. Then somehow all the negative thoughts in my head disappeared.
Now I am more excited, cherishing my life and happier.

So thank you makes me feel better.
Thank you Seventeen for coming and making us (carat) happy.
We Love You Seventeen! And
Seventeen is my only favorite idol group !! 💕❤😊

Seventeen keep fighting!

author: @gertrudelirio3560
text:
I will protect and support SEVENTEEN at all costs because they been saving me all this time.
I've been thru some difficult shit to the point I thought that giving up will be easier than fighting. But seeing them start from rock bottom, struggling and continue doing their best to reach their dreams change my heart. I suddenly thought I also want to do my best I also want my dreams to come true I also want to be free from everything that's been chaining me. Yes, it wasn't easy there were times I thought that only chosen privilege individuals are able to reach their goals. But every single comeback they remind me nothing is easy, just keep doing your best, keep your head upon your goal, keep improving, compete with yourself not with others until the time that all your hard work pays off. I was rushing and juggling everything so that I can finally see the results of my hard work yet nothing was happening. And every time I feel like this their music, again and again, saves me from giving up. SEVENTEEN thank you for reminding me this time that I have time that there's no need to rush that I can pause and breathe then continue from where I left off. You guys really are amazing. I love you to no end.

text:
Terima kasih banyak seventeen atas kerja keras nya selama ini. Membuat aku yang sedang bersedih dan bingung, bisa kembali tenang hanya karena kalian. Terima kasih banyak atas cinta kalian untuk kami, terima kasih untuk kalian yang menahan sakit dan lelah hanya untuk kami. Terima kasih juga telah menghibur kami semua dengan lagu-lagu kalian. Maaf, aku hanya bisa mendukung dari jauh dan belum bertemu kalian secara langsung. 

Aku adalah salah satu dari banyaknya carat yang lain. Aku juga akan berusaha keras agar bisa bertemu dan bisa mendukung kalian lebih. Terima kasih banyak atas semuanya yang telah kalian lakukan. Kami mencintai kalian

author: @rachelsumendap4644
text:
thank you.
thank you seuncheol. the best leader seventeen, carats, and anyone could ever ask for. you've done well, and fought well. i'm beyond thankful for you leadernim. you are so strong both physically and mentally. thank you for taking time off and prioritizing yourself and your mental health first, because that's the most important thing. thank you for coming back stronger than ever. i can't be more than happy for you, i'd give you all the time in the world you need to be happier.
thank you jeonghan. the fallen angel from heaven that has been sent to the world to be part of our shining seventeen and making carats lives brighter. thank you for being the comfort everyone seeks for, for being the angel that protects the membersji and carats. and for teaching us humor with your once in a while evil plans. but we all know you have the kindest soul.
thank you joshua. the softest beloved gentleman. thank you for silently taking care of everyone around you, and always wanting to do the best in everything you do. like how seventeen and carats are a blessing to you, you are too such a blessing to us carats. you were truly sent from God to make this world a blessing. we're all so proud of you, you are a dutiful son, we all love you josh.
thank you junhui. the funniest guy, most handsome dancer and singer, and a powerful center. thank you for working so hard and pushing yourself to be a better artist than you already are. thank you for showing us this brighter, more exciting side of you that is so lovable. you and your little antics and habits can crack up your members and carats every time. it's exciting to see how much you've come out of the shell to be more yourself, the lovable person you are. 
thank you soonyoung. our shining excited tiger. thank you for the artwork you created with seventeen's amazing choreographers. thank you for the overflowing energy you have given your members and carats. it's amazing how you can instantly boost someone's energy by your own presence, even if you'd tire yourself because of that. and how you can keep everyone going at points of exhaustion or when performing. thank you, please also take all the time to recharge, our bright star.
thank you wonwoo. the intelligent human being who likes to read and don't eat seafood. thank you for being the warm person you are to everyone even with the cold looks you have and for blessing us with your deep beautiful voice. thank you for keeping everyone's brains intact and all the smart life quotes you make. please don't ever question why thousands of people are supporting you and cheering for you, because you deserve all those love for working hard and for overcoming your trauma.
thank you jihoon. the main mastermind behind seventeen's beautiful art. our genius singer, songwriter, composer, producer, dancer, and coca-cola enthusiast guy. thank you so much for being the poet to seventeen's poems, the man behind the masterpieces of svt. thank you for always working day and night, sacrificing your sleep even though you love it, for writing incredible songs. and thank you for loving your members insecurities and knowing them heart by heart.
thank you minghao. the art and artist xu minghao himself. thank you for showing us the true meaning of art, for showing us different kinds of masterpieces of arts you created and teaching us how to appreciate the little things in life. thank you for working hard to show infinite charms that you have inside you. the most loved little 8, savage guy that should be protected at all cost. thank you for being yourself.
thank you mingyu. the smartest handsome guy and most responsible. thank you for always cleaning up everyone's mess, for being the fixer of broken things, for being the master chef that you are. thank you for being the man that everyone looks up to because of your talent and skills in everything. for always finding happiness in the current situations. you've taught us to never give up on our dreams, that we can do it. you've showed us that there is always a positive thing when times are rough.
thank you seokmin. the most precious gem stone, our musical singer, our wool of happiness. thank you for always being the happiest virus that you are, your smile is the brightest light we'd ever need to light up our worlds. thank you for always looking forward positively, for being considerate of others, for always wanting to make everyone smile and loved, for only seeing the good in everyone and everything. dokyeom, you are doing so incredibly well as an artist, don't ever be insecure and don't ever doubt yourself. you're one talented singer.
thank you seungkwan. the winner of rookie entertainer award, our comedian singer that is not a comedian okay, he is singer. thank you for always being who you are since you were a kid, someone who loved singing and someone who loved making everyone laugh. you are the best version of yourself, our diva boo, the lively, bright, energetic person you are. thank you for always enjoying and appreciating the time to yourself too. 
thank you hansol. venonie, our quiet intelligent breathtaking rapper. thank you for being the amazing composer you are at a young age, and for being the free-spirited. thank you for teaching us "swag", and for teaching us that nothing is weird or funky, when it comes to expressing yourself. you're such a unique human being that don't need to say a lot of words to be iconic. thank you for the effortless being the walking, living, breathing human meme you are and putting laughs in carats and the members faces.
thank you chan. the future of k-pop, a little giant, maknae on top. thank you for the brightest curing laugh ever in the world. chan, your laugh is so contagious and it makes us happy by just hearing it. it's amusing to see how much you've grown as an artist and as a person. thank you for being the most talented maknae, a singer, dancer and choreographer, and a rapper. you have it all. thank you for being the powerful performer you are, amazing us with your stage presence everytime. 
THANK YOU SEVENTEEN. thank you for the hard work, and for making masterpieces of music. thank you for being the 13 men that carats loves and will forever support. thank you for making carats constantly feel loved and spoiled. seventeen, you guys are such a blessing to carats. we're all beyond grateful we have found you. thank you is even an underrated word to express how thankful we are to seventeen. our healing. our shining diamonds. our flowers. thank you seventeen. carats, TIL THE LAST SAY THE NAME!

author: @amaliakaromahtulhikmah2474
text: Disini, aku akan mengatakan, terimakasih, kalian sudah membawaku keluar dari kegelapan dan kesepian pasca almarhumah nenekku, pasca beliau meninggal, aku merasa kesepian walau sudah berada bersama sahabatku, aku adalah korban pengucilan teman-teman hampir sekelas, dan itu adalah masa terburuk buatku, bahkan di ulang tahunku yang ke 17 aku tidak dapat merasakan apapun karena begitu banyak luka yang ku terima, belum lagi keluarga besar ikut menyalahkan ku karena lalai menjaga ibuku yang sakit stroke ringan, jadi luka batinku semakin bertambah dikarenakan sebagai anak perempuan pertama harus kuat, harus bisa setegar karang, dan di usiaku yang ke 17 tahun, aku mulai menjadi carat. Entah itu sebuah kebetulan atau emang takdir. Suatu saat nanti kalau aku bisa ketemu kalian langsung, aku mau ucapkan banyak terima kasih, karena kalian sudah membawaku kembali dari titik kegelapan ke dunia yang lebih indah. Kalau kalian baca ini, aku hanya bisa bilang terima kasih yang paling dalam dari diriku akhirnya aku mau melanjutkan hidupku yang masih panjang. Sudah dari dulu aku ingin menyampaikan ini secara langsung, tapi aku juga harus memikirkan banyak hal, yang masih jauh lebih penting dari apapun. Semoga suatu saat aku bisa ketemu kalian buat menyampaikan hal ini secara langsung. Sekian curhatan saya, dan bagi carats yang liat komentar saya, tolong tetap hidup walaupun itu untuk dirimu sendiri, kalian harus tetap punya alasan hidup agar kalian tidak terjebak dalam situasi yang menyakitkan. Semoga hari kalian menyenangkan and i love you all

author: @parasjoans.4364
text:
"Whatever happens to us." 
Something happened to me, to us, specifically. I am a Carat for 4 years now, long enough right? I promised to stay with you until the last say the name. I promised that you guys will always be in my heart. But something happened, I'm lost. I'm confused. I think I falling out of love. And just the thought of that, I want to cry. How could I? I don't want to believe but I can't fool myself anymore. I always say it's just I'm missing them, but no it's not. I'm sorry. I'm sorry. Seventeen, you inspired me, you saved me, you made me happy. 

I'm totally lost. My heart aches. But no, I'm not gonna break my promise. SEVENTEEN, my babies, please wait for me. I'm gonna find myself, my carat self 4 years ago, and bring that back. For now, I'm lost but I assure you
We will meet again 
We shall meet again
My road towards you will never end. 

I don't want this to be my goodbye. I promise that I will find my way back to you and by then
"Let's meet again". I love you

author: @fmnzxxs5192
text: suatu saat nanti aku bakal ngenalin mereka beserta karya karya mereka ke anak anakku. ada saatnya mereka nanti merasa ga dibutuhin dan ga dipeduliin bahkan oleh orang tua sendiri yaitu aku. aku pengen saat mereka ngerasain hal itu, mereka punya sandaran dan ada yg mengerti mereka sama sepertiku. bukan berarti aku gamau ngertiin anak anakku, tapi pasti mereka ngelaluin masa ini. aku bakal cerita ke mereka seberapa besar pengaruh seventeen buat aku. dari dulu, aku nyari musik yg klop sama aku dan alhamdulillah aku kenal mereka, Seventeen. jujur, aku bukan kpoper dulunya. bukan karena apa tapi ya karena belum ada musik kpop yg masuk dan pas dihatiku. tapi pas tau karya karya mereka, bener bener pas banget buatku. awalnya cuma musik mereka yg bisa motivasi aku buat lebih baik dan ngilangin segala overthinkingku. tapi semakin ngenal mereka, semakin sayang. aku ngeliat mereka sebagai panutan. awards yg mereka dapet tentu bikin aku bangga. tapi selain itu yg bener bener bikin aku jatuh cinta adalah kepribadian mereka. lewat reality show mereka aku belajar banyak hal. hal hal yg aku butuhin buat sekarang dan kedepannya. aku ngebanggain mereka bukan hanya karena mereka idol tapi karena kepribadian mereka. mereka ber-13 sangat berpengaruh di kehidupan remajaku. mereka jadi healingku. sebenernya bisa aja aku ninggalin mereka karena keadaanku udah cukup baik. tapi aku rasa, aku butuh ngembaliin apa yg mereka beri buatku. jadi, aku milih bertahan sampai SAY THE NAME, SEVENTEEN yg terakhir kalinya. dan buat kalian, carats. kalian juga memotivasiku, banyak banget. aku merasa bangga punya keluarga seperti kalian. semoga aku, kalian, dan seventeen tetap seperti ini. aku sayang kalian dan terima kasih :)

author: @Malak-n4r
text:
네가 편히 걸을 수 있도록
언젠가 널 위핸 길을 만들어 줄 거야
파도위에서 흔들리고 있어도
훗날 우린 파도를 밟고 서 있을거야

낯선 길 위에서
누구나 길 잃어 버릴 수 있어
험난한 길도 내가 함께할 테니

우리 다시 함께노래하는 그때, 그날까지
너를 향한 이길은 끝나지 않을 거야
모든 이유와 이 길이
아름다운 건 네가 있어서

이 길의 끝에서 반환점 마저 지나면
네가 더는 지치지 않게 내가
내가 널 지켜 줄게
혹여 무슨 일 있어도 우리
다시 꼭 만나자…
어두운 밤을 걸을 때
걱정하지 마 내가 있잖아
밝은 빛이 스며들어 어둠을 밝혀줘


 
우리 다시 함께노래하는 그때, 그날까지
너를 향한 이길은 끝나지 않을 거야
모든 이유와 이 길이
아톰다운 건 네가 있어서

이 길의 끝에서 반환점 마저 지나면
네가 더는 지치지 않게 내가
내가 널 지켜 줄게
혹여 무슨 일 있어도 우리
다시 만날 거야…

잠시 우리 숨을 고르고 또다시
힘들고 지친 여정을
끝내고 우리 마주해
아침이 오기 전에 그때
절정이 이르듯 우린
성장통을 겪고 있는 거야

나에게로와 길을 헤매고 있다면 언제든
따스한 온기를 나누면 길을 다시금
찾을 수 있을 테 니까
겁내지 않아도 괜찮아

이길의 끝에 온기와 따뜻한 미소가
빠르게 지나가는 시간 속에
우릴 지켜 줄 거야
잠시 속도를 늦춰도 우리
다시 만날 거야…

author: @Malak-n4r
text:
You can walk comfortably
Someday I’ll make a path for you.
Even though I’m shaking on the waves,
One day, we’re gonna have a lot of waves.

On a strange road
Anyone can get lost
I’ll be with you on the tough road

Until the day we sing together again
This road to you will not be over
For every reason and this length
You’re the one that’s beautiful
At the end of this road, after the turning point
So that you don’t get tired anymore, I’ll…
I’ll protect you
No matter what happens, we…
We’ll see you again.

When you walk in the dark night
Don’t do it yourself, I’m here.
Bright light seeps in, it brightens the darkness

We sing together again, until that day
This path to you will never end
For every reason and this length,
You’re the one that’s beautiful

After the end of this victory and the halfway point,
Don’t get tired anymore, I’ll…
I’ll protect you
No matter what happens, we…
We’ll see each other again.
Let’s take a breath for awhile and then we’ll go back
The hard, kept journey
Finish it and Pace us

Before the morning came then
We’re at our peak
It’s growing up
Come to me, if you’re lost, any time

When you share warm warmth, the road comes back
We’ll find it, you don’t have to be scared
At the end of this road, there’s warmth and a warm smile
They’ll protect us in the Past-paced hours
Let’s slow down for a while.
We’ll see each other again.

author: @harynahoon
text: Went to their concert in 2018 and it was such a memorable one. It hurts to see them sick and tired during all the concerts they amazingly did their best just to put a smile on CARATS faces. All 13 of them are angels. Thank you for always do your best in everything. SEVENTEEN has never fail to make me the happiest whenever im down. Thank you to SEVENTEEN for being the first group for me to attend their concert here in Msia. I am truly amazed by the experience I had with them. Seeing them on stage with the brightest smile had brought so much meaning in my life. There are time I found life is awfully hard for me to go thru, but im lucky that SEVENTEEN managed to be with me thru their songs whenever I am about to give up. Thank you SEVENTEEN, i love you. Thank you for always make it happened.

author: @Belle-u3p
text: Let’s just say I didn’t expect to have my eyes to sting with tears and I never get emotional but I did, and lest also just say I started stanning Seventeen a month ago and I would like to say never have I actually have seen them lacking off as a producer, dancer, and singer is something they are all good, and their voices are just so mesmerizing to the fact I feel like we should all know woozi is a tiny little amazing genius, and that they are all so talented and sometimes Joshua is underrated, but if there’s one thing I know is that they all are talented in every single way, and that you don’t have to just buy albums, but merch, go to all their concerts, and even do more than that, but we should all appreciate their music because that’s their goal for us to love their music, and Kpop isn’t just concerts, albums, light sticks, merch, and more but it’s so much more than that, and although Seventeen may have not been my first group they’ll always be with me in my heart and be one of the most talented groups out there with all others groups, so if there’s one thing we should do is appreciate seventeen’s music and other Kpop groups music.
