author: @fujoshina8957
text:
Seventeen's presence in my life is the most inspiring and amazing sensation from mansae era and onwards. I have looked to them to feel positivity and optimism towards the life I lead. Whenever I'm down and consoling to friends they would tell me, "listen to seventeen!" As a way to cheer me up because they know how much seventeen has brought me joy in hard times when I couldn't find the motivation to even smile. 

I admit there was a time where I fell out of seventeen or more of like held out on them. I don't mean to bring up an extremely sensitive subject but after Jonghyun's death it made me realize the extent of an Idol's life and how different it is to how they really are (I've always known this but when something incredibly serious happens its makes it frighteningly real). I admit, though not fair, I began to distrust seventeen's sincerty and doubted everything they say in front of the camera because I felt it was a script or a director telling them what to say. I wasnt even a shawol but having grown up with the 2nd gen kpop groups, it still left me in a sobbing mess for days. This made me scared that if the same thing were to happen to seventeen, god forbid, I can not imagine the downfall of my mental and emotional state. I got so scared that I started to distance myself from seventeen and kpop in general. 

After a year, I finally returned and though I am not as active or as invested as I used to be, I rediscovered my deep gratitude and appreciation for seventeen. Through this series, it made me break down those walls of doubt and mistrust that I held towards seventeen. If there is one thing I can count on from seventeen, it is their raw and honest feelings they hold for us as we do for them. I see them as brothers and friends who are filled with wisdom and kindness. They have and always were my ultimate group but they will be the only group I deeply care for and spend time watching. I appreciate other groups too but I just listen to their songs as opposed to getting too into them as a group or people. For me, these 13 men are all I need to be content and happy in the kpop fandom.

author: @aliphiarefisa6981
text:
Mau tutorial cimol anti meledak gak?

Mauu

Oke cus.

1. Siapin adonan cimolnya (resepnya cari di gugel, saya males ngetik)
2. Kalo udh siap adonannya bulet²in.
3.Siapin minyak buat goreng, boleh bimoli, boleh sania. Treserah apa aja yang penting minyak, tapi jangan minyak urut juga
4.Panasin minyaknya. Biar cepet panas kata²in aja.
5.Kalo udh panas cemplungin adonan cimolnya.
6.Pas di goreng jangan di kasih bom, ntar meledak. Bukan satu rumah doang yang meledak. Satu RT kena brou.
7.Goreng sampe mateng. Kalo takut meledak pake jas ujan sama helm aja.
8.Kalo udh mateng angkat, jangan ditinggal ntar gosong. Kan apinya blm di matiin. 
9.Matiin apinya dlu baru di angkat ya. Matiinnya jangan di tiup, ntar ga mati². Di puter tu cetekannya.
10.Kalo udh mati angkat, tiriskan, diputar, dijilat, jangan di celupin lagi.
11.Taro di piring, kasih bumbu dehh. Boleh bumbu asin, boleh manis, boleh pedes. Selera lu aja dah.

Sekian tutorial dari saya, semoga bermanfaat!

author: @xushii9984
text: It's taken me a day to fully put all my words coherently... and I know that there are so many other people who feel the same way, that Seventeen has been the home I can come home to. The moment this song came out I was just sobbing, holding my chest and just chanting many thank yous to the air. I felt so comforted and... I didn't feel alone, finally. For the whole day I put this song on loop and I've been streaming it. Even though I know Seventeen shouldn't be my everything, they have been such a big part of my life. They've always brought me back up. They've taught me that it's okay to not walk so quickly all the time. We'll all get there, it isn't a matter of time. I definitely haven't been with Seventeen since the beginning, but I know I'll stay until the end. The last "say the name" might just be the start of something new, and when that day comes, I'll still be so happy and thankful for Seventeen. Imagine, 7 years of just love, producing beautiful music, making precious memories... this song just comforts themselves and CARATs as well that no matter what happens, we'll see each other again.

Tutorial ngerakit album:
1.Harus punya duit
2.Kalo udh punya duit beli albumnya, kalo gak beli albumnya ntar gak bisa DIY album
3.Tungguin sampe albumnya sampe, kalo blm sampe sama aja boong.
4.Kalo albumnya udah sampe di buka dulu bungkusannya, kalo gak di buka mau DIY APAAN MALIHHH.
5.Nah kalo udh punya albumnya mari kita DIY
6.Keluarin semua isiannya
7.Trs di pasang²in deh.

Sekian tutorial dari saya, semoga bermanfaat kawand²

author: @Fangirlqueen17
text:
Five years went by so fast, you never stopped moving forward. Thank you for sharing your talent, passion and sincerity. From "boys who dance to NoNoNo & 2nd Gen Kpop songs" to being the ultimate boy group I stan. I can't believe that I used to watched those clips on repeat from your predebut days to seeing new content you create for us.
Thank you for loving us as your fans and for acknowledging our existence . Nobody's perfect but you guys as SEVENTEEN became one! Throughout these years you never ceased to amazed me by your dedication. I've been a Kpop fan for 13 years now and you are one of I admire the most. Despite the ups and downs, you strived to show your own color. Regardless of the comparisons between you and other Idol groups, you remained as who you are. Took the challenge to level up yourself. I love you guys! I hope you will stay healthy and happy. May great things happen to all of us! SEVENTEEN will be FOREVER LOVED by CARATS ❤️😭

author: @soleinquinn775
text: I only started liking kpop when my friends introduced me to it back when i was in 8th grade. And back then I'm still not that into it probably because I haven't really found a kpop group that I feel really connected to until Seventeen came. Everything just clicked with me and Seventeen and up till now I think Seventeen will be my "one and only". Even though i might like other kpop groups' songs, it's still Seventeen for me. I love all their songs, all their choreos, all their performances, all their members, personalities, EVERYTHING that makes up Seventeen. Woozi is my ultimate bias but I love every single one of them. "Smile Flower" hit me straight in the heart and now "Us, Again" dug deep and buried itself in my heart. Thank You Seventeen, I'm proud to be a carat and no matter what happens in the future I WILL ALWAYS LOVE AND SUPPORT YOU. 💗❤❣️🤗

author: @채린-p9u
text:
네가 편히 걸을 수 있도록

언젠가 널 위한 길을 만들어줄 거야

파도 위에서 흔들리고 있어도

훗날 우린 파도를 밟고 서 있을 거야

낯선 길 위에서

누구나 길을 잃어버릴 수 있어

험난한 길도 내가 함께할 테니

우리 다시 함께 노래하는 그때, 그 날까지

너를 향한 이 길은 끝나지 않을 거야

모든 이유와 이 길이

아름다운 건 네가 있어서

이 길의 끝에서 반환점마저 지나면

네가 더는 지치지 않게 내가,

내가 널 지켜줄게

혹여 무슨 일 있어도 우리,

다시 꼭 만나자




어두운 밤을 걸을 때

걱정하지 마 내가 있잖아

밝은 빛이 스며들어 어둠을 밝혀줘

우리 다시 함께 노래하는 그때, 그 날까지

너를 향한 이 길은 끝나지 않을 거야

모든 이유와 이 길이

아름다운 건 네가 있어서

이 길의 끝에서 반환점마저 지나면

네가 더는 지치지 않게 내가, 

내가 널 지켜줄게

혹여 무슨 일 있어도 우리,

다시 만날 거야




잠시 우리 숨을 고르고 또다시

힘들고 지친 여정을

끝내고 우리 마주해

아침이 오기 전에 그때

절정이 이르듯 우리

성장통을 겪고 있는 거야




나에게로 와 길을 헤메고 있다면 언제든

따스한 온기를 나누면 길을 다시금

찾을 수 있을테니까

겁내지 않아도 괜찮아

이 길의 끝에 온기와 따뜻한 미소가

빠르게 지나가는 시간 속에 우릴 지켜 줄 거야

잠시 속도를 늦춰도 우리,

다시 만날 거야

author: @veahland
text:
i felt like its been such a long journey. since ive stanned svt, starting around the CLAP era, ive always felt like theyre the people who make me feel welcomed. theyre family. theyre the people i can turn to when im feeling sad. seeing them in concert just confirmed that. theyre my everything, they've helped me through so much and have helped me survive and grow in my life. they, themselves, have grown so much. i feel like this journey has been long, but i never want it to end. 
thank you, all thirteen of you. seungcheol, jeonghan, joshua, jun, soonyoung, wonwoo, jihoon, minghao, mingyu, seokmin, seungkwan, hansol, chan. youre all my family. carats are my family. theres many other fandoms i call 'family', but carats and seventeen really are the ones who make me feel at home. youre all my home. i love all of you guys so much. 
thank you for helping us all grow. youre our shining diamonds.

author: @keirolo3085
text:
Seventeen, es mi todo. Siempre me dan una caricia al alma, y sus palabras me envuelven como si me estuvieran abrazando ellos mismos. Mi corazón desborda amor y felicidad cada vez que los veo. Es como si estuviera partido en 13 y cada uno tiene un pedacito de él. 
Llevo poco tiempo siendo Carat para ser sincera, pero siento como si los hubiera conocido desde toda la vida. Son arte, y lo puedo decir con mucha seguridad. Yo simplemente no puedo describir lo que siento, porque es difícil. Siempre estaré agradecida de haberlos conocido, de sacarme una sonrisa con tan solo una sonrisa o una tontera por parte de ellos. Me hacen feliz. Seventeen tiene mi amor incondicional ♡
Seventeen fighting ¡!

Pd: Comento esto en español porque mi inglés es muy malo ;(

author: @mnemosyneimd5866
text:
For years, I struggled with depression. It really messed me up, and clouded my high school and early college years with doubts and insecurities. After having to withdraw from school for the sake of my mental health this December, I hit a low point. I wasn't sure if I could go on, or if I'd lost my way forever. Still, I had one thing to look forward to--I'd started stanning Seventeen in August of 2016, but I hadn't had an opportunity to go to one of their concerts until now. Slowly, I'd come to love and trust them, until they became the brightest light in my world. Then, I got to see them in Newark this past January.

Everything changed. I could feel it start when they started singing 9-Teen, as I was two months shy of my 20th birthday--at the end of my teenage years, and the lyrics really resonated with me. Then, after the last Aju Nice, their last goodbye, standing there under the infinite confetti rain, listening to Our Dawn is Brighter Than Day, one of my favorite songs, I really understood--I'm loved by these thirteen amazing young men. These people who cheered with me for the last three hours, they're with me through this. I can do this. For the first time in five years, holding a piece of confetti, I felt truly alive.

Six months later, and I'm back in school, earning A's for the first time since middle school. I found my path, and I'm walking it hand in hand with Seventeen.

Thank you to Seventeen, for bringing light back into my life. Thank you Carat, for passing the torch to me. I love you all.

author: @natashaghazali4757
text: I can't believe it's already been 5 years with my 13 kings T.T Seventeen has truly gotten me through some of the darkest moments of my life, especially after my father passed away 6 months ago. Their "Ode to Your" tour in the US was the only thing I was able to look forward to during the winter. I can't even begin to express how thankful I am for all of the hard work Seventeen puts into their creative content and performances. They inspire me to find myself, and find reasons to keep going after my dreams. Seeing their raw, vulnerable sides in "Hit the Road" broke my heart in so many ways. They're so strong, but I only wish they allow themselves breaks to rest, and to heal, and seek the same comfort that I feel when I listen to their voices. They're like my 13 multivitamins - a daily dose of Seventeen has helped to alleviate my depression. They bring me so much laughter and light and warmth, that the only words I can say to capture my gratitude are "Thank you". I love you guys so much and will support you until the very end! Though I don't want to imagine a future without Seventeen, I know our memories will be immortalized in the music.

author: @karlaphloem6084
text:
I can't believe it's only 6AM where I am and I'm crying this hard already. I found SEVENTEEN at a time where I was transitioning from being a student to my first job and I feel like I found them when I needed them most. They gave me comfort me times were hard, made me smile when all I wanted to do was cry, helped me gain friends through their music. 

I can't believe it's already 5 years after their debut. Time flew by so fast! I may not have been there since the first Say The Name but I'll make sure to be there until the last...and even beyond that. 

SEVENTEEN, let's live happily and healthily for a long, long time. 사랑해요.

author: @snoozemiu
text: although it's only been a year since i decided to stand with seventeen, i haven't had a single regret since. every moment i've spent with them stays in my heart as some of the happiest moments in my life so far. seventeen has gotten me through some of the toughest experiences of my life to this day, and nothing i say or do will ever express the almost overwhelmingly abundant amount of gratitude i have for you, the 13 men who have strived to not only achieve success, but to give back just as much love, support, and gratitude to us. i can honestly say that you have made me into a better person. thank you for making so many of us feel less alone in our thoughts, and for being a safe haven to us with your music and each of your personalities. your words, art, and even seeing so much as you guys simply being content and living your lives, gives us so much happiness and security in our lives. it always amazes me how you almost seem to give back to us tenfold. for everything you've given us, all i can say is thank you. thank you for being our home, our safe haven, our 13 wonderful shining souls. please know that you can trust we will be the same to you, even long after the final "say the name." let's meet again soon, i hope you're happy and healthy. you deserve the world and so much more. ♥︎

author: @katie0707
text:
it’s half way through the day and i’m in floods of tears. no one will ever understand the amount of love and appreciation i have for seventeen. for each and every member. they’ve helped me through it all. i don’t regret falling for them at all. they’re my brothers, my family, my home. thank you seventeen, for continuing to work hard no matter what. thank you for never giving up on your members or us, your carats. we’ll always be here, till the end and beyond then. i am forever grateful for each of you. 
i find it hard to open up about my emotions. all my sadness, tiredness and feelings build up and it’s only when everyone else in the house is asleep and it’s 2am where i can truly let my emotions out. i vent to seventeen’s music or to videos about them. i haven’t even finished hit the road yet because of how emotional i get. it breaks me to see them exhaust themselves for us and to feel depressed and anxious. it really made me realise that they’re human too, they’re no different from me.
when i listen to smile flower, or to hug, or to any slower seventeen song, i like to let the moment last. i don’t get the chance to listen to them often because i don’t allow myself to be upset. i’m embarrassed in front of others when i get upset. 
with us again, i feel even more passionate about my love for them. because of seventeen, i get through everyday and strive to be the best person i possibly can be, and that’s what they’d want for us. 
i don’t mean to get personal, but last year and the year before then, i was getting badly bullied in school. i dealt with it, and it got sorted out, but i had insane trust issues afterwards. to make it worse, in august of 2019, my cat passed away. he helped me through the bullying and he was my best friend. it was seventeen and seventeen alone who nursed me back to health and to a stable mindset. i’m still grieving over my cat, but thanks to seventeen i learned how to trust again and to love again. i now have the bestest friends anyone could ever hope for, and i know the most beautiful people ever, and it’s seventeen i have to thank for that.
thank you; seungcheol, jeonghan, jisoo, junhui, soonyoung, wonwoo, jihoon, minghao, mingyu, seokmin, seungkwan, hansol and chan. i will FOREVER be a carat, and i mean that. thank you for being there for me when i felt that no one else was. i will be there always, till the last say the name and after. ❤️❤️❤️

author: @juleleo4997
text: I've never, not even for a second, regretted ultimating Seventeen. They've been with me in my darkest times and have become my home. They make my sleepless nights feel less lonley and painful. I am so grateful for everything they did. For about half a year now I've been really stressed out and felt lazy/slowed down because of it and I hate myself for it. But Seventeen has always been there to tell me that everything will be alright, that it's okay to approach things slowly for some time and that I'll find my path some day. I haven't found that path yet, but once I did I'll continue walking it with them by my side. Thank you Seventeen.

author: @holdmydynamite8058
text:
Algún día te haré un camino
Para que puedas caminar cómodamente
 
Aunque estamos temblando en estas olas ahora
 
Un día estaremos firmes en estas olas
 
En un camino desconocido, cualquiera puede perderse
Estaré a tu lado incluso en este camino difícil
 Hasta el día que cantemos juntos otra vez
Hasta ese día, este camino que conduce a ti no va a terminar
 
Todas las razones y este camino son hermosos porque estás aquí
Cuando llegamos al punto medio de este camino
 
Para que no te canses más, te protegeré
 
Pase lo que pase, asegurémonos de encontrarnos nuevamente
Mientras camina por un camino oscuro
 
No te preocupes, estoy aquí.
Traeré la luz brillante a través de la oscuridad
 Hasta el día que cantemos juntos otra vez
Hasta ese día, este camino que conduce a ti no va a terminar
 
Todas las razones y este camino son hermosos porque estás aquí
Cuando llegamos al punto medio de este camino
 
Para que no te canses más de eso,
 
Yo te protegeré
Pase lo que pase, asegurémonos de encontrarnos nuevamente
 Tomemos un momento para recuperar el aliento
 Para que podamos terminar juntos este duro viaje.
reuniéndose cara a cara
Antes de que llegue la mañana ya estamos llegando a la cima
Experimentaremos nuestros dolores de crecimiento
 
Ven a mí cada vez que te sientas perdido
 Cuando compartimos este calor
 
Puedes encontrar el camino una vez más
No tienes que tener miedo
 
Al final de este camino esta calidez y esta cálida sonrisa
Nos protegerá en este momento eso pasa demasiado rápido
Incluso si disminuimos la velocidad por un momento juntos
Nos volveremos a ver ...

Perdón si esta mal carats simplemente puse la letra en ingles en el traductor para ahorrarles el trabajo, sigamos apoyando a los chicos cada vez mejor, se esfuerzan demasiado y se merecen el mundo entero así que sigamos el camino que nos dieron

author: @oneandonlycox
text:
I WAS NOT READY TO CRY
Since carats are telling their stories, here's mine! I discovered them 
when they debuted, I knew the songs and the members. However, it was 
when Mansae came out that I really decided to stan. Then, when the Love Letter 
album came out, I fell in love with each one of them... this era reminds
 me of so many good memories, I was AMAZED by Pretty U and Popular 
Song!! 
Seventeen is one of (if not) the best groups out there! They are 
talented, hilarious, they can work on their own and we can see that they
 truly love each other. I love them with all my heart. Also, some of 
y'all carats stories made me emotional, I can't stop crying ahhhh

author: @yuniani8423
text:
Thank you seventeen for being exist in my life. 

I'm a multi fandom, and already being a kpopers at least for 10 years. I've known seventeen for years but only for their title songs. I can't even tell kyeom and wonwoo also shua and jeonghan apart. But HIT and FEAR really draw me and maybe same as some people out there, I think "well, let's try to remember their name". Start from that, I'm spending all of my quarantine time watching most of their reality show and end up falling for them. In my opinion, from all groups that I've been stanning, seventeen is the most lovely one. How they react, how they love one another, their passion and their consistency to show their love for carats really amazed me. Once again, thank you for being such a wonderful group and exist in my life.

text: I Have been A carat for about two months now. I first listened to Seventeen in 2019. My first songs where Home Q&A and Clap. I fell in love with home I listened to it about 10 times a week. After that I learned all the members and I became a carat. I will never leave seventeen’s side they helped me so much I am so grateful. Thank you seventeen ❤️💎 -Carat

author: @tillthelastsaythename
text:
I get asked quite often, "why do you support kpop?" "Are you crazy?" I wish to shout to the world "its not just K-Pop..it's not just some craze about some handsome boys.. Its their music, passion, dedication.. Its to watch n listen to stories of tears, resilience, growth despite struggles, persistence towards their goals, not losing hope.. And then remembering that while they are growing in their life, they are sharing their talent with me and helping me grow, keeping me focused on my dream.. 

Seventeen is not just hard choreographies, beauty, synchronisation and self production.. Seventeen is also support system for fans, standing up for what's right, message of hope & mental strength and above all a family.. 

Till the last 'Say the name's & beyond...

author: @ellenpoon5942
text:
I have only been a fan since HIT, but it feels as if I was a Carat for even longer than that. I feel as if I never got into them, like they were here in my heart forever. Seventeen is one of the only few groups I have this feeling for. 

Lately I have been going through a lot of things, and this documentary has comforted me, even though it made me cry, both of joy and sadness. Seeing other people, especially artists, expressing how they feel has helped me. Releasing this song, knowing the general lyrics from their documentary, means a lot to me. This is one of the few songs that I will keep close to my heart. 

I realized that being a Carat was one of the decisions made in my life that I will never regret. EVER. I hope that other Carats, or even people who just randomly find them, can be comforted by this group. 

THANK YOU SEVENTEEN, FOR HELPING ME GET THROUGH THE THINGS I HAVE FACED.

author: @danicafabro2536
text:

author: @izabela6687
text:
When i was listening to this song for who-knows-which-time I remembered how people say they don't listen to songs they don't understand, because of language. And i had a thought that it only means they don't listen to it to appreciate the song, they just listen to the words, and the words are only a part of the whole message sent us by artist.
When carats listened to Us again at first, even when not knowing the lyrics we felt, we knew, we heard what they were telling us. Because we listened whole heartedly to the song, not just lyrics, and the lyrics only made the song more special.
And i want to laugh at people not listening to other languages, it's them that should be laughed at, not kpop stans or people who listen to any other languages. They miss out big time.

author: @chwehweui7336
text:
I was only 5th Grade when I became a Carat, I was so confused that time. I even thought the other members as the others HAHAHAHAHAH but that only last for 2 days. I've managed to memorize all of them. That was way back in 2017, in between DWC era and Baksu era. Then, they really inspired me that time even though I only started stanning them for like months. I am really motivated to finish my studies and everything.

 I, then, went to 6th Grade with recognition and honors, thanks to them. When I was in 6th grade, I remember me, being so problematic. But every time I listen to them sing and rap, watching them dance, watching them perform, watching them grow, watching them achieve their dreams, all of those problems were washed away by them. All I could see in myself that time was the smile and tears of joy that they brought to me. I graduated from elementary, thanks to Seventeen, once again.

 Leveled up again. 7th Grade then welcomed me last year, too many stress and frustration hugged me. I was so depressed, frustrated, stressed, and it even led me to anxiety. "Damn those studies. Damn these thesis. Damn these tests. Damn these diagnostics. Damn these lectures. Damn these family problems. Damn these fake friends. Damn this society. Damn." That's everything that I could only think of that time, but I thought of Seventeen. To soothe and ease all the pain away, I just let my thoughts shrink down and listen to Seventeen's songs. Hug then played. I really cried so hard and spent my whole night listening to Hug, as well as, Campfire, Run to You, Smile Flower, Thanks, and Home. I became motivated once again. I became optimistic. 

And I found myself, after months, free from stress (but not from frustration).I just finished my first year this year, and now moving on the 8th Grade. Thanks to Seventeen. 
My mother is really against with the thought of me, being a Kpop fan, and keeps on saying that I am just wasting my time for them. And whenever I am telling her that I would like to buy merch, she would say "you're wasting money." even if I am the one who will save money and pay for it. But I ignored that though, I will prove to Mom that Seventeen is not a distraction, afterall they are inspirations and our motivations. 
*Thanks to Seventeen. Thank you for everything you've done for us. Thank you from saving me, and other carats, from anxiety. Thank you for being the motivations and inspirations that we needed. Thank you for being the shoulders that we can lean on. Thank you for being our home and healing. Thank you for everything, Seventeen! Let's be together forever! Until the last! Say the Name, Seventeen!*
*Seventeen Best Boys!!* *SARANGHAEEE!*

author: @trishaluvventwong7306
text:
This song is my new smile flower.

 The first seventeen song to make me cry without context (lyrics translation). A lot of seventeen songs made me cry, but that's with the addition of visual and lyrics translation.

I can't express how deep this touched me, I resonate and relate so hard to them. I love them so much. I've said most of it n the last episode but I can't not comment on this. So grateful to be a carat.

No other bond will ever be able to replace seventeen-carat because we're family. From now, until the end. Even at the end, memories will take its place.

Forever grateful to slip into the diamond life at March 2017. Forever grateful to feel for them. Forever grateful for the introduction to my close carat friends. Forever grateful for the journey together ❤️

- a carat

author: @charitz4229
text: I became a carat not long ago this year, but it was during quarantine that I sincerely and with all my heart became a seventeen fan. We haven't been together for too long, but they have already helped when I needed it. I have been stressed and feeling like I was becoming failure, I was loosing myself. But Seventeen made me think and realize that I could do it, that I just had to keep on fighting. I looked forward to "Hit the Road" every week, and at night I open weverse wanting to "meet" them, even if it's just by reading what they put. I am a multi-fandom, and not many groups make me feel this way. Thank you, Seventeen. I look forward to many more years with you. I still got a lot to learn about you, but you already have a place in my heart.

author: @나뉴-p7g
text:
우리, 다시

네가 편히 걸을 수 있도록
언젠가 널 위한 길을 만들어줄 거야
파도 위에서 흔들리고 있어도
훗날 우린 파도를 밟고 서 있을 거야

낯선 길 위에서
누구나 길을 잃어버릴 수 있어
험난한 길도 내가 함께할 테니
우리 다시 함께 노래하는 그때, 그날까지
너를 향한 이 길은 끝나지 않을 거야
모든 이유와 이 길이
아름다운 건 네가 있어서
이 길의 끝에서 반환점마저 지나면
네가 더는 지치지 않게 내가,
내가 널 지켜줄게
혹여 무슨 일 있어도 우리,
다시 꼭 만나자

어두운 밤을 걸을 때
걱정하지 마 내가 있잖아
밝은 빛이 스며들어 어둠을 밝혀줘
우리 다시 함께 노래하는 그때, 그날까지
너를 향한 이 길은 끝나지 않을 거야
모든 이유와 이 길이
아름다운 건 네가 있어서
이 길의 끝에서 반환점마저 지나면
네가 더는 지치지 않게 내가,
내가 널 지켜줄게
혹여 무슨 일 있어도 우리,
다시 만날 거야

잠시 우리 숨을 고르고 또다시
힘들고 지친 여정을 
끝내고 우리 마주해
아침이 오기 전에 그때
절정이 이르듯 우린
성장통을 겪고 있는 거야

나에게로 와 길을 헤메고 있다면 언제든
따스한 온기를 나누면 길을 다시금
찾을 수 있을 테니까
겁내지 않아도 괜찮아
이 길의 끝에 온기와 따뜻한 미소가
빠르게 지나가는 시간 속에 우릴 지켜 줄 거야

잠시 속도를 늦춰도 우리,
다시 만날 거야

text: I cried when I first listened to this bc it gave me big Smile Flower vibes and when I read the translations, all bets were off and I was SOBBING LOL in all my years of liking kpop and stanning groups, no other group has gotten to me like Seventeen has. I’m older than half of them, but it’s not a far stretch when I saw that they’ve all inspired me to be the best version of myself and to keep going on even when things get rough. Truly, no one will ever be disappointed if they decided to become fans of Seventeen; you’ll only feel love, acceptance, and encouragement 🥺💕

author: @eilliworld
text:
6+7+2+0+2+0=17
Song released at 0526pm.
-
Thank you for your music. Thank you for your dance choreography. Thank you for your voice. Thank you for caring for us. Thank you for always being the best boys. Thank you for being crackheads. Thank you for being their at my darkest moments. Thank you for bringing happiness and light into my life. Thank you for giving me hope. Thank you for being such a good inspiration. Thank you for saving my life. Thank you for everything you've done. Thank you for existing. SINCERELY THANK YOU TO OUR MULTI-TALENTED BOYS, SEVENTEEN. 💎

author: @allehandeulla
text:
I knew it. They are king of the spoiler and every single word from hit the road war part of either a poem or this... A very beautiful and poetic song. And as I write this my heart is filled with a very special heat, a proud like heat because I know that being a carat was the best decision I've ever made. That going to their concert is the best experience in my life yet and that laughing, crying, learning with these 13 guys is one of the best things ever. They've given us SO MUCh starting with the tour and then HTR and then this and then a Mini Album. And... I'm just so proud of them, as Jun said, I'm proud of them even when they just breath... I'm proud of SEVENTEEN, I'm proud of CARAT too. I'm proud of being a carat for almost 5 years and I will never regret this. 
S.coups, if this was the song you were listening during the weverse conversations... I don't even know what to say but I know that you are a proud as us for this masterpiece. 
Thank you SEVENTEEN. 
Thank you so much for being the best, for being our lights, for being whatever we need you to be whenever we need it... I hope we are the same for you and that this beautiful relationship we (SVT×CARAT) share lasts as long as it can last. 
Thanks again. 
Now I'll drown in my tears while listening to this amazing song again.
